24.SummaryEnglish: a fan edit of It and It Chapter 2 into a four episode series restructured to flow more like the book

1.TitleEnglish: 3 Years before the Great Age of Pirates...

2.SummaryEnglish: Buggy, after being defeated by Luffy, Zoro, and Nami, begins his quest to regain his body parts and his crew, and then he will get his flashy revenge on Luffy. Manga Chapter(s): 35-75 cover stories Anime Episode(s): 46-47

3.SummaryEnglish: Koby and Helmeppo are new cabin boys for the marines, but they become unwillingly involved in an escape attempt by Morgan. Their bravery will either earn them the respect of their superiors—as well as Vice Admiral Garp—or it will spell their doom. Manga Chapter(s): 83-119 cover stories Anime Episode(s): 68-69

12.TitleEnglish: The Desert Doo Doo Hits the Fan
12.SummaryEnglish: When Crocodile yells "Oh no! Water!" it's game over! Join Monkey D. Luffy and his courageous crew—Nami, Usopp, Chopper (who does doctoring), Sanji, and Zolo—as they save Alabasta from the crooked clutches of Baroque Works! Manga Chapter(s): 199-201 Anime Episode(s): 121-122 Duration: 18:55

13.TitleEnglish: If You Could Go Anywhere... The Adventures of the Straw Hats
13.SummaryEnglish: Somewhere in the world... Sanji resists, while Robin meets terrible people. Franky's not himself, and Usopp learns to survive. Chopper avoids becoming food, and Nami reports on the weather. Brook is repaid in underpants, and Zoro... is lost and annoyed. Manga Chapter(s): 543-560 Anime Episode(s): 453-456

1.TitleEnglish: Romance Dawn, the Dawn of an Adventure
1.SummaryEnglish: Influenced by the straw-hat-wearing pirate Red-Haired Shanks, an enthusiastic young boy named Monkey D. Luffy dreams of one day becoming King of the Pirates. Manga Chapter(s): 1 Anime Episode(s): Episode of East Blue, 312 (Intro)

2.SummaryEnglish: While Alvida and her pirates plunder a cruise ship, they come across a barrel containing a strange boy named Monkey D. Luffy. The timid Koby befriends Luffy, and they share their grand dreams with each other. Manga Chapter(s): 2 Anime Episode(s): 1

3.TitleEnglish: The Pirate King and the Master Swordsman
3.SummaryEnglish: In search of members for his pirate crew, Luffy with his new friend Koby arrive at Shells Town. There, they track down the renowned Pirate Hunter Zoro but run afoul of Helmeppo, son of the infamous Captain Morgan. Manga Chapter(s): 3-5 Anime Episode(s): 2, 19

4.SummaryEnglish: Luffy convinces the captive Zoro to join his pirate crew, but they must first defeat the tyrannical Captain Morgan. Manga Chapter(s): 5-7 Anime Episode(s): 3

1.SummaryEnglish: Nami, a street-smart girl who loves money and tangerines, makes Luffy's acquaintance. To save herself and steal a map to the Grand Line, she tricks Luffy into allowing her to turn him over to the infamous pirate Buggy the Clown. Manga Chapter(s): 8-11 Anime Episode(s): 4-6

2.SummaryEnglish: Luffy meets a small dog guarding his late master’s store. Meanwhile, Beast Tamer Mohji, Cabaji the Acrobat, and the lion Richie show up in the streets of Orange Town to get revenge for Captain Buggy's humiliating loss. Manga Chapter(s): 12-19 Anime Episode(s): 6-7

3.SummaryEnglish: Shockingly, it turns out Captain Buggy and Red-Haired Shanks share a common history. When the bombastic clown rips Shanks' straw hat, Luffy's rage knows no bounds. Manga Chapter(s): 19-21 Anime Episode(s): 8

1.SummaryEnglish: With Nami joining as Luffy's navigator (though not as an actual member of the crew), they arrive at Syrup Village in search of a proper ship. There they meet a man claiming to be a pirate captain who also seems to have ties to Red-Haired Shanks. Manga Chapter(s): 23-25 Anime Episode(s): 9-10

2.SummaryEnglish: After uncovering a devious plot, Usopp warns the village and Kaya, but finds his years of lying make it difficult to convince people of the truth. Manga Chapter(s): 26-27 Anime Episode(s): 10-11

3.SummaryEnglish: Usopp resolves that if he is to keep the peace, the town must continue to believe he is a liar, which means he cannot let Captain Kuro’s men up the slope to the village! Luffy, Zoro, and Nami aid Usopp in his plan to keep the Black Cat Pirates at bay. Manga Chapter(s): 28-30 Anime Episode(s): 12-13

4.SummaryEnglish: Captain Kuro makes his appearance, and with Zoro too injured to fight, Luffy incapacitated, and Usopp and Nami too weak to make a stand, the situation is desperate. However, Kaya herself arrives, intent on bargaining with Kuro. Manga Chapter(s): 31-34 Anime Episode(s): 13-14

5.SummaryEnglish: While the fight between Luffy and Kuro continues, Jango works to force Kaya to bequeath her family's money to the Black Cat captain. Despite the Usopp Pirates' efforts to stop the hypnotist, it seems as if the transaction is all but inevitable. Manga Chapter(s): 35-39 Anime Episode(s): 15-17

6.SummaryEnglish: Kuro's ultimate move attacks everything in the area, friend nor foe notwithstanding, and Luffy becomes enraged by Kuro's lack of regard for his crew. Manga Chapter(s): 40-41 Anime Episode(s): 17

7.SummaryEnglish: With Usopp now on the crew and their new ship, the Going Merry, under their command, the Straw Hats head to an island said to hold a fabled treasure. There they encounter a strange man stuck in a box who has been looking for the same treasure. Manga Chapter(s): 42, 22 Anime Episode(s): 18

1.SummaryEnglish: The Straw Hats happen across Zoro's former partners, Yosaku and Johnny, whose dietary dilemma reminds the pirates they still need a cook on their ship. Thus, they set sail for the sea restaurant Baratie, hoping to snag a chef. Manga Chapter(s): 42-44 Anime Episode(s): 19-21

2.SummaryEnglish: Luffy is on hiatus from pirating to work as a cabin boy to pay off the damage done to the Baratie. While he tries to convince Sanji to join his pirate crew, the pirate Gin brings the infamous Don Krieg and his entire starving fleet to the sea restaurant. Manga Chapter(s): 45-47 Anime Episode(s): 21-22

3.SummaryEnglish: It's revealed that Chef Zeff was once a great pirate known as "Blaze Leg" Zeff, and his fighting spirit is as strong as ever. Meanwhile, Gin explains how his men met disaster in the Grand Line when they ran afoul of a devastatingly strong opponent. Manga Chapter(s): 47-49 Anime Episode(s): 23-24

4.SummaryEnglish: As Nami steals the Going Merry, Hawk-Eye Mihawk, known far and wide as the world's greatest swordsman, arrives all the way from the Grand Line to finish off Don Krieg. However, Zoro challenges the deadly Mihawk to a duel in order to achieve his dream. Manga Chapter(s): 50-52 Anime Episode(s): 23-24, 29, 135

5.SummaryEnglish: Mihawk departs after defeating Zoro, and Krieg continues his assault on the Baratie. Pearl, one of Krieg's strongest men, goes on the offensive with fiery attacks and multiple shields at his disposal, so Sanji reveals his unique fighting style. Manga Chapter(s): 53-55 Anime Episode(s): 25

6.SummaryEnglish: Sanji continues to battle Pearl, but Gin cleverly holds Chef Zeff hostage, forcing Sanji to let Pearl hit him or lose his mentor for fighting back. Sanji's childhood memories flood his mind, and he reflects on why Zeff means so much to him. Manga Chapter(s): 56-59 Anime Episode(s): 26

7.SummaryEnglish: In a surprising twist, Gin finishes Pearl off himself, claiming Sanji as his own target. Though still wounded, Sanji rises to the challenge and faces off with Gin. As the battle draws to a close, Don Krieg unleashes a deadly toxin into the air. Manga Chapter(s): 59-63 Anime Episode(s): 27-28

8.SummaryEnglish: The struggle with Krieg nears its end. Luffy's fighting spirit is unwavering, even after taking several hits from the giant battle spear. Straw Hat’s strategy shifts to smashing through Krieg’s defenses and attacking the spear head-on. Manga Chapter(s): 63-67 Anime Episode(s): 28-29

9.SummaryEnglish: As dust from the battle settles, Gin, despite still being poisoned, decides to go back to the Grand Line with Krieg, and Sanji makes the difficult decision to join Luffy's crew. Then, Yosaku returns with news of where Nami took the Going Merry. Manga Chapter(s): 67-68 Anime Episode(s): 30

1.SummaryEnglish: As they depart the Baratie in pursuit of Nami and the Going Merry, Yosaku warns Luffy and Sanji about the vicious Arlong and his fishman underlings. Meanwhile, Usopp, Johnny, and Zoro make landfall where Nami docked the Merry. Manga Chapter(s): 69-71 Anime Episode(s): 31-32

2.SummaryEnglish: Usopp, having challenged the fishmen, has been caught. To effectively prove her loyalty to the Arlong Pirates, Nami is left with a morbid choice. Manga Chapter(s): 71-73 Anime Episode(s): 32-33

3.SummaryEnglish: Luffy’s group has reached the island but are met with a shocking revelation. Unmoved by Nami’s apparent actions and her insistence that he leaves, Luffy stubbornly sticks around. Manga Chapter(s): 74-76 Anime Episode(s): 33-34

4.SummaryEnglish: Nojiko goes into detail about Nami's childhood and their adoptive mother Bell-mère, a former marine. Despite being poor and unrelated by blood, they had a happy life on their tangerine orchard. Manga Chapter(s): 77-78 Anime Episode(s): 34-36

5.SummaryEnglish: When a Navy officer under Arlong's pay confiscates all the money Nami accumulated over the years, it becomes clear where Arlong stands on his promise. Manga Chapter(s): 79-81 Anime Episode(s): 36-37

6.SummaryEnglish: Nami's audible sorrows have reached the ears of a certain Straw Hat captain, and he and his crew rise to action. The villagers look on in awe as the Straw Hats boldly enter Arlong Park to face the fishmen. Manga Chapter(s): 82-84 Anime Episode(s): 38-39

7.SummaryEnglish: Luffy’s newest move leaves him incapacitated and at the mercy of the sea while Zoro, Sanji, and Usopp desperately fight off Arlong’s top officers. Manga Chapter(s): 85-87 Anime Episode(s): 39-40

8.SummaryEnglish: The top officers are defeated, but as they currently are, Sanji and Zoro prove to be no match for Arlong. However, with Luffy finally free, he just may just be able to pull it off. Meanwhile, Nami finally gathers the courage to face Arlong. Manga Chapter(s): 88-90 Anime Episode(s): 40-42

9.SummaryEnglish: Luffy springs into action against Arlong, and their intense struggle commences! Luffy becomes enraged when he discovers how exactly Arlong had been using Nami, and he comes to a quick decision on how to finally free her of her shackles. Manga Chapter(s): 91-94 Anime Episode(s): 42-43

10.SummaryEnglish: Arlong's reign of terror is over, so the island throws a party to celebrate their freedom and to honor their pirate saviors. During the festivities, Nami makes her decision to officially join the Straw Hat Pirates. Manga Chapter(s): 94-95 Anime Episode(s): 43-44

1.TitleEnglish: The Town of Beginnings and Endings
1.SummaryEnglish: Touting a fresh bounty issued by Navy HQ, Luffy and co. make landfall at Loguetown, the place where Gold Roger was both born and executed. Being the last stop before the Grand Line, the crew stocks up on supplies and sightsees. Manga Chapter(s): 96-97 Anime Episode(s): 45, 48-49

2.SummaryEnglish: Usopp manages to anger the brat daughter of bounty hunter Daddy the Father and finds his own life at stake. When Daddy discovers that Usopp is the son of Red Hair Pirate Yasopp, the only man to beat him, he offers him a risky way out. Manga Chapter(s): 97 Anime Episode(s): 48, 50-51

3.SummaryEnglish: Luffy finally finds the execution platform, only to be caught in Buggy and Alvida's trap. Sanji and Zoro rush to stop Buggy from poetically executing Luffy where Roger died. Manga Chapter(s): 98-100 Anime Episode(s): 52-53

1.SummaryEnglish: Following a near disaster in the Calm Belt, the Straw Hats take a wild ride up and down a mountain… and are promptly swallowed by a giant whale! Manga Chapter(s): 101-103 Anime Episode(s): 54-55, 61-62

2.SummaryEnglish: After learning of Laboon the whale's plight, Luffy comes up with a solution befitting his style. As thanks, Crocus reveals that navigating the Grand Line will not be as simple as following a compass or relying on currents and wind. Manga Chapter(s): 103-105 Anime Episode(s): 62-63

1.SummaryEnglish: As the Straw Hat Pirates travel from Reverse Mountain to Whisky Peak, Nami adjusts to having to watch the log pose constantly. When they arrive at their destination, the townspeople greet them warmly, despite the sight of their Jolly Roger. Manga Chapter(s): 106-109 Anime Episode(s): 64-65

2.SummaryEnglish: As Mr. 5 and Miss Valentine chase after the fleeing princess Vivi, Igaram begs Zoro to save her. But just when Zoro is about to take on Vivi's assailants, an enraged Luffy confronts him under a massive misunderstanding of the swordsman's latest actions. Manga Chapter(s): 110-114 Anime Episode(s): 65-67

1.SummaryEnglish: The Straw Hats arrive at their destination and discover that the island is home to enormous creatures... and people. Meanwhile, the Baroque Works agents Mr. 3 and his partner Miss Golden Week receive new orders. Manga Chapter(s): 115-117 Anime Episode(s): 70-71

2.SummaryEnglish: Usopp, immensely impressed with the giants of Elbaf, names Brogy his master. To commemorate their duel, the giants imbibe two barrels of booze from Nami, but, unbeknownst to anyone, a saboteur has tampered with one of them! Manga Chapter(s): 117-118 Anime Episode(s): 71-72

3.SummaryEnglish: Despite his internal injuries and Luffy's warnings, the prideful giant Dorry insists on continuing his duel with Brogy. Meanwhile, the Baroque Works officer agents begin to make their move on the island with the Straw Hats as their next targets. Manga Chapter(s): 119-122 Anime Episode(s): 73-74

4.SummaryEnglish: Luffy, Usopp, and Karoo launch headlong into rescuing their friends, but Miss Golden Week runs a colorful interference. Mr. 3 is forced to take matters into his own conniving hands, and Usopp brainstorms how he will finally free his friends. Manga Chapter(s): 123-126 Anime Episode(s): 75-76

5.SummaryEnglish: Sanji, pretending to be Mr. 3, convinces Crocodile he has eliminated Vivi and co., prompting the Unluckies to arrive and deliver a way off Little Garden. With a clear path straight ahead—or so it seems—the Straw Hats set sail. Manga Chapter(s): 127-129 Anime Episode(s): 77-79

1.SummaryEnglish: En route to Arabasta, Nami falls ill. Without a doctor aboard the Going Merry, the Straw Hats must decide whether to stay the course or find more immediate help. As their ship crosses into a frigid area, a figure is seen standing on the water's surface. Manga Chapter(s): 129-132 Anime Episode(s): 78-79

2.SummaryEnglish: If the Straw Hats have any chance of saving Nami, they must carry her up a mountain to see the sole doctor of a nameless, winter island. While Sanji and Luffy fight off the wilderness, a despicable king makes an unwanted return. Manga Chapter(s): 132-135 Anime Episode(s): 80-81

3.SummaryEnglish: A devastating avalanche sweeps Drum Island and puts everyone at risk, but Luffy—step-by-step, hand-over-hand—continues his death-defying ascent up the mountain. Meanwhile, Vivi, Usopp, and Zoro reunite in the wake of the disaster. Manga Chapter(s): 136-139 Anime Episode(s): 82-83

4.SummaryEnglish: Enter Chopper: a talking, transforming blue-nosed reindeer who was trained by Dr. Kureha in medicine. The Straw Hats immediately see the positives and want him on their crew, but Chopper must first deal with the monstrous pain in his heart. Manga Chapter(s): 139-140 Anime Episode(s): 84

5.SummaryEnglish: Chopper began life as an ordinary reindeer but was shunned by his own kind because of his unusual blue nose. Even after eating the Human-Human Devil Fruit, the islanders wanted nothing to do with him. That is, until Chopper met a certain quack doctor. Manga Chapter(s): 140-145 Anime Episode(s): 85-86

6.SummaryEnglish: Wapol and his comrades reach the mountaintop castle to wrest control of it back from Dr. Kureha and Chopper. Luffy, Sanji, and Chopper go head-to-head against his Munch-Munch powers, vowing to keep Wapol and his men from bringing down Hiriluk's flag. Manga Chapter(s): 140-141, 145-148 Anime Episode(s): 83, 86-88

7.SummaryEnglish: Chopper counters the combined Chessmarimo with an item that expands his zoan fruit abilities. Wapol slips away into his old castle, but Luffy runs after him to force a final showdown. Manga Chapter(s): 149-152 Anime Episode(s): 88-90

8.SummaryEnglish: Finally convinced to join the Straw Hat Pirates, Chopper announces his intentions to Dr. Kureha. While she doesn’t receive the news well at first, she decides to give the Straw Hats a fond parting gift while they exit the island. Manga Chapter(s): 142, 153-155 Anime Episode(s): 90-91

1.SummaryEnglish: In Arabasta, the hero Crocodile appears and puts a decisive end to a pillaging band of pirates. Meanwhile, Mr. 2 Bon Kurei pays a visit to the newly arrived Straw Hats. When he puts his abilities on display, Vivi notices something shocking. Manga Chapter(s): 155-157 Anime Episode(s): 92

2.SummaryEnglish: The Merry makes landfall at Arabasta’s port town, and while the rest of the Straw Hats wisely don disguises, Luffy runs afoul of an old foe. However, a chance reunion with a flame-wielding member of Luffy’s family might just be the saving grace he needs! Manga Chapter(s): 157-159 Anime Episode(s): 93-95

3.TitleEnglish: Adventure in the Kingdom of Sand
3.SummaryEnglish: The Straw Hats finally start their arduous trek across the deserts of Arabasta! Along the way, they encounter martial-arts-loving dugongs, avian con artists, a giant carnivorous reptile, and a camel with very particular tastes in his passengers. Manga Chapter(s): 159, 161-162 Anime Episode(s): 96-98

4.SummaryEnglish: Vivi and co. finally reach Yuba, the last known location of the Rebel Army, but there is nary a soul in sight. Meanwhile, at the behest of their hidden leader, Baroque Works' officer agents begin to gather at the Spiders Cafe. Manga Chapter(s): 159-164 Anime Episode(s): 98, 100-101, 103

5.SummaryEnglish: At Rain Dinners, the Baroque Works officer agents are finally let on to Mr. 0's true identity. And just outside Yuba, Luffy confronts a stubborn Vivi to remind her who else is willing to stand with her. Manga Chapter(s): 164-166 Anime Episode(s): 100, 103-104

6.SummaryEnglish: Luffy's band reaches the city of Rainbase but run afoul of Smoker and Tashigi. As they defend themselves against both the Navy and Baroque Works' millions, Luffy's party storms Crocodile's Rain Dinners Casino. Manga Chapter(s): 166-168 Anime Episode(s): 104-105

7.SummaryEnglish: Luffy leads a daring—but foolish—raid on Crocodile’s casino. His poor planning lands him behind bars with Captain Smoker. But more importantly, these actions leave Vivi alone and unprotected. Manga Chapter(s): 169-170 Anime Episode(s): 106

8.SummaryEnglish: “The king of Arabasta” appears to order Nanohana’s attack. With this, the people's anger explodes! Meanwhile, Vivi frantically looks for Sanji, and as Crocodile leaves the pirates to their fate, he is suddenly contacted by a "Mr. Prince." Manga Chapter(s): 171-174 Anime Episode(s): 107-108

9.SummaryEnglish: Thanks to Sanji's brave actions, the Straw Hats made their escape, and Captain Smoker graciously looks the other way as they flee. However, as they set out toward Alubarna, Crocodile waylays Luffy, and the two begin a vicious duel. Manga Chapter(s): 175-178 Anime Episode(s): 109-110

10.SummaryEnglish: Vivi’s party speeds along toward Alubarna, as does the Rebel Army. While the Supersonic Duck Squad helps Zoro and the others play decoy, Vivi sets out on her own to try and stop Koza and his rebels. Manga Chapter(s): 179-183 Anime Episode(s): 111-112

11.SummaryEnglish: Despite his severe injuries, Karoo picks up Vivi to flee the attacks of Mr. 2, and they dash madly through the battlefield. And at the southeast gate: Chopper and Usopp vs. Mr. 4 and Miss Merry Christmas! Manga Chapter(s): 183-186 Anime Episode(s): 113-114

12.SummaryEnglish: Usopp and Chopper combine their skills to finish off Mr. 4 and Miss Merry Christmas, and Sanji engages Mr. 2 in a vicious foot-to-foot struggle. Meanwhile, as a last-ditch effort to save her people, Princess Vivi gives Chaka an unprecedented order. Manga Chapter(s): 187-189 Anime Episode(s): 115-116

13.SummaryEnglish: Nami combats Miss Doublefinger, whose Spike-Spike powers quickly turn their brawl into a losing battle. That is, until Usopp's invention, the Clima-Tact, gives Nami a fighting chance. And at the palace, Crocodile reveals his ultimate goal. Manga Chapter(s): 181, 189-192 Anime Episode(s): 113, 116-118

14.SummaryEnglish: Crocodile reveals he seeks the mysterious Pluton, Nami has one last chance to stop Miss Doublefinger, and Zoro struggles against Mr. 1. As Zoro confronts certain death, he must remember something his sensei once imparted. Manga Chapter(s): 192-195 Anime Episode(s): 118-119

15.SummaryEnglish: Vivi reveals Crocodile's heinous plan to Koza. To stop the fighting, Koza raises the white flag but is suddenly shot. To induce even more panic, Crocodile announces that a massive bomb will be launched into the city, and he drops Vivi to her doom. Manga Chapter(s): 196-198 Anime Episode(s): 120-121

16.SummaryEnglish: Luffy vs. Crocodile: Round 2! Luffy has discovered Crocodile’s weakness, but the power of the Sand-Sand Fruit is devastating regardless. Meanwhile, the remaining Straw Hats have 10 minutes find a hidden cannoneer before a bomb is launched into the city. Manga Chapter(s): 199-201 Anime Episode(s): 121-122

17.SummaryEnglish: Luffy and Crocodile enter the third phase of their duel, and, without water at his disposal, Luffy is forced to improvise. Back on the surface, Vivi uses her knowledge of the city to finally pinpoint the location of the bomb's cannoneer. Manga Chapter(s): 202-205 Anime Episode(s): 123-124

18.SummaryEnglish: Vivi finds the cannon but realizes the bomb can't be stopped so casually. Then Pell swoops in with a decisive, if tragic, solution. The final battle between Luffy and Crocodile, which has both parties driven to their utmost, reaches its conclusion. Manga Chapter(s): 206-210 Anime Episode(s): 125-126

19.SummaryEnglish: Igaram appears with proof of Cobra's innocence, and Koza tells the people the truth behind the war. Luffy and his crew are brought into Cobra's palace to rest, and, during this time, Igaram receives word that there are new bounties making the rounds! Manga Chapter(s): 211-214 Anime Episode(s): 127-128

20.SummaryEnglish: As the Straw Hats make their escape from Arabasta, Bon Kurei and his men serve to distract Black Cage Hina of the Navy. Meanwhile, Vivi must make a speech, but, more importantly, she must decide whether to stay with the Straw Hats. Manga Chapter(s): 214-216 Anime Episode(s): 128-129 Duration: Unavailable

21.SummaryEnglish: The Straw Hats have evaded the marines, but a new development crops up when a certain stowaway makes her presence on the Going Merry known… and she wants to be part of the crew! Manga Chapter(s): 217-218 Anime Episode(s): 130

1.TitleEnglish: Why the Log Pose Is Spherical
1.SummaryEnglish: When a galleon-size ship falls from the sky and Nami's log pose begins to point straight up, the Straw Hats sense a new adventure on the horizon. Right after a mysterious map is pulled from the wreckage, a group of salvagers come to claim the fallen ship. Manga Chapter(s): 218-220 Anime Episode(s): 143-144

2.SummaryEnglish: Mock Town on western Jaya openly welcomes pirates, but that fact is accompanied by constant danger. While asking about the sky island, Luffy and Zoro have a run-in with the loud pirate Bellamy the Hyena who ridicules their dreams. Manga Chapter(s): 221-224 Anime Episode(s): 145-146

3.SummaryEnglish: After a one-sided brawl with Bellamy, the Straw Hats meet a black-haired pirate outside the bar who reaffirms their dreams and insists the sky island is real. As they depart for the other side of Jaya, another salvager of the Saruyama Alliance appears. Manga Chapter(s): 225-226 Anime Episode(s): 147

4.SummaryEnglish: The Straw Hats meet Montblanc Cricket, whose descendant was none other than Montblanc Noland, an infamous "liar" who told of a city of gold on Jaya. Cast out for looking for artifacts from the fabled city, he may just know a way to get to Skypiea. Manga Chapter(s): 227-228 Anime Episode(s): 148

5.SummaryEnglish: Cricket explains how the Straw Hats can ride a dangerous vertical sea current to get to Skypiea. However, they must first catch a south bird to steer them toward the point where the stream will erupt from the ocean. Manga Chapter(s): 229-230 Anime Episode(s): 149

6.SummaryEnglish: While the Straw Hats are in the forest attempting to catch a south bird, Bellamy and his crew attack Masira, Shoujou, and Cricket and steal every gold artifact they had collected over the years from the salvage work of the Saruyama Alliance. Manga Chapter(s): 231-232 Anime Episode(s): 150

7.TitleEnglish: The Highest Authority in the World
7.SummaryEnglish: The duel between Bellamy and Luffy shocks all who look on. More shocking are the movements of fearsome pirates on the Grand Line and the machinations of the Blackbeard Pirates, as their captain vies for a position as a warlord. Manga Chapter(s): 232-234 Anime Episode(s): 145, 151

8.SummaryEnglish: Luffy returns victorious from his showdown with Bellamy, and the Going Merry has been refit by the Saruyama Alliance to handle its upcoming upward flight. The Straw Hats follow their captive south bird and steel themselves for their journey to the sky. Manga Chapter(s): 235-236 Anime Episode(s): 152

1.SummaryEnglish: The Straw Hats, having used the Knock-Up Stream to fly into the sky, arrive on a white ocean above the clouds. While they marvel at the otherworldly sights, they are attacked by a powerful masked figure, and a mysterious flying knight comes to their aid. Manga Chapter(s): 237-238 Anime Episode(s): 153

2.SummaryEnglish: After bidding farewell to Gan Fall and passing through the gate to Skypiea, the pirates encounter a family of Skypieans: Conis and her father, Pagaya. The two explain the workings of life in the sky and introduce the crew to the different dials. Manga Chapter(s): 239-240 Anime Episode(s): 154

3.SummaryEnglish: Nami takes the waver out for a test ride and discovers the forbidden Upper Yard. Meanwhile, law enforcement arrives and rudely harasses the rest of the gang. Manga Chapter(s): 241-242 Anime Episode(s): 155-156

4.SummaryEnglish: The pirates are fed up and ready to leave Skypiea, but Nami, Zoro, Robin, and Chopper are whisked away aboard the Merry. The remaining Straw Hat Pirates must face Enel’s challenge, so Conis shows them the way to Upper Yard. Manga Chapter(s): 243-244 Anime Episode(s): 157-158

5.SummaryEnglish: Aboard the Little Crow, Luffy, Usopp, and Sanji enter Upper Yard and must choose an ordeal. Meanwhile, Zoro and co. have their own troubles at the Sacrificial Altar. When they leave to explore the forest, Chopper is left to repair the Merry. Manga Chapter(s): 245-246 Anime Episode(s): 159-160

6.TitleEnglish: The Village Hidden in the Clouds
6.SummaryEnglish: Luffy, Sanji, and Usopp are locked in a life-or-death struggle against the Priest Satori. It's all they can do to withstand the random attributes of Satori's strange spheres and to overcome the power of mantra, which can seemingly predict their movements. Manga Chapter(s): 247-249 Anime Episode(s): 160-163

7.SummaryEnglish: Gan Fall is severely burned during his battle with Shura, and Chopper musters the courage for a leap of faith. Elsewhere, Luffy and co. finally discover a way to defeat the mantra-wielding Satori, and the Shandians prepare for an all-out attack on God! Manga Chapter(s): 250-251 Anime Episode(s): 163-164

8.SummaryEnglish: The Shandians’ attack on Upper Yard commences! At the Sacrificial Altar, the crew is finally reunited, and everyone recounts what has happened. Chopper looks after the injured Gan Fall, and the pirates devise a plan to steal the gold on the island. Manga Chapter(s): 252-254 Anime Episode(s): 165-167

9.SummaryEnglish: The crew splits up into Nami's escape team and Luffy's exploration team. Unfortunately, a giant snake attacks and separates Luffy's team. To top it all off, the Priests have set up their ordeals across the whole island. Manga Chapter(s): 255-257 Anime Episode(s): 168-169

10.SummaryEnglish: Only 80 remain in the Upper Yard survival game. Zoro finds himself face-to-face with the Shandian Braham, Luffy takes on Wyper and his burning bazooka, and Nami’s group on the Merry has the deadliest encounter of all! Manga Chapter(s): 258-260 Anime Episode(s): 170-171

11.SummaryEnglish: Luffy's fight with Wyper lands him in a dark cavern filled with ruins, Enel leaves a deadly pair of new enemies to deal with Nami and Gan Fall, and Chopper comes face to face with Sky Punk Gedatsu. Manga Chapter(s): 261-263 Anime Episode(s): 171-173

12.SummaryEnglish: Enel continues his attack, wiping out several fighters regardless of their allegiance. An hour remains until Enel's deadline, and only 24 survivors remain. Meanwhile, after a deadly struggle with the rotund Yama, Robin makes the discovery of a lifetime. Manga Chapter(s): 264-266, 268 Anime Episode(s): 173-174

13.SummaryEnglish: While Luffy remains lost in a strange, dark cavern, at the Upper Ruins, Priest Ohm confronts Zoro, Gan Fall, and Wyper with his Ordeal of Iron. As the fight wears on, Shandian warriors, Nami, and Aisa make a sudden appearance. Manga Chapter(s): 266-269 Anime Episode(s): 175-176

14.SummaryEnglish: After being swallowed by the giant snake, Nami, Gan Fall, and Aisa meet someone they never expected would be in the serpent's stomach. As Priest Ohm’s Ordeal of Iron comes to a close in the Upper Ruins, Zoro unleashes a powerful new technique. Manga Chapter(s): 270-273 Anime Episode(s): 177-179

15.SummaryEnglish: The lost ruins of Shandora are revealed in a spectacle of lightning, and the remaining survivors of Enel's twisted game begin their showdown with the self-styled deity. As the group faces him, "God" reveals his ultimate goal.

16.SummaryEnglish: God Enel reveals his grand masterpiece to the sole survivor of his deadly game, and Luffy finally frees himself of the snake's stomach. Meanwhile, Conis makes a desperate dash to Angel Island to warn its residents of their impending doom.

1.SummaryEnglish: As they continue to traverse the Grand Line, the Straw Hats pass a ship with no sails, no Jolly Roger, and no captain. After an encounter with giant sea monkeys, they come upon an island where everything is much longer than usual. Manga Chapter(s): 304-306 Anime Episode(s): 207-209

2.SummaryEnglish: Luffy accepts Foxy’s challenge to a Davy Back Fight, a pirate contest in which the stakes are the crews themselves! Round #1 is the Donut Race, where each team races around the island in tiny boats made from just the scraps of three barrels. Manga Chapter(s): 307-309 Anime Episode(s): 209-210

3.SummaryEnglish: Unexpected interference from Foxy himself cost the Straw Hats more than they bargained for. Now, in a struggle against literal monsters, the unlikely duo of Sanji and Zoro must win round #2, the Groggy Ring. Manga Chapter(s): 310-312 Anime Episode(s): 211-212

4.SummaryEnglish: The two captains face off in a final game: a battle of brawn aboard Foxy's ship in round #3, Combat! Luffy, sporting a killer afro and an attitude to match, steps into the boxing ring to put the hurt on Foxy. Manga Chapter(s): 313-316 Anime Episode(s): 212, 215, 217-218

5.SummaryEnglish: The final round of the Davy Back Fight rages on, and atop the deck of Foxy's ship, the epic battle nears its climax. During the fight, Luffy makes a surprise discovery about Foxy's powers that he keeps strategically hidden. Manga Chapter(s): 317-318 Anime Episode(s): 219, 226

6.SummaryEnglish: Only three officers in all the Navy hold the position of admiral, literal paramount powers of the World Government. The icy Aokiji, one such admiral, catches up with the Straw Hats, but Luffy is not the one he is after. Manga Chapter(s): 319-321 Anime Episode(s): 227-228

1.TitleEnglish: The City of Water, Water Seven
1.SummaryEnglish: The keepers of Shift Station, Kokoro and her granddaughter Chimney, point the Straw Hats in the direction of the metropolitan Water Seven. The nearby city is regarded as the best place to find a decent shipwright for the Going Merry. Manga Chapter(s): 322-324 Anime Episode(s): 228-230

2.SummaryEnglish: The Straw Hats cash in their Skypiean gold and meet up with Iceburg, the celebrity mayor of Water Seven, to see about an appraisal for their ship's repairs. While the foreman Kaku checks the Merry, dubious people eye the pirates' money. Manga Chapter(s): 324-326 Anime Episode(s): 229-231

3.TitleEnglish: The Case of the Kidnapped Pirate
3.SummaryEnglish: Kalifa shows Luffy and co. around Dock One and tells them about Iceburg and Galley-La Company. During the tour, Kaku returns with some bad news, and a long-nosed Straw Hat goes missing… along with the money he was watching! Manga Chapter(s): 326-329 Anime Episode(s): 232-234

4.SummaryEnglish: The Straw Hats raid the Franky House, but they soon find that their real target, Franky, is long gone with the stolen money. When the battered Usopp awakens, nothing can prepare him to hear what Luffy has decided about the Merry. Manga Chapter(s): 330-332 Anime Episode(s): 234-235

5.SummaryEnglish: Usopp is unwilling to say farewell to the Going Merry… not without a fight, that is! He challenges his former captain to a duel between men, so Luffy honors the pride of his former crewmate and faces him in battle. Manga Chapter(s): 332-333 Anime Episode(s): 235-236

6.SummaryEnglish: Iceburg has been shot! When Luffy and Nami decide to go check on him, the fire-breathing, half-mechanical Franky challenges the Straw Hats’ captain. Before their fight gets too heated, Galley-La swoops in with an unexpected accusation! Manga Chapter(s): 334-337 Anime Episode(s): 237-239

7.SummaryEnglish: Things are hectic enough with Franky going after Luffy, but now the Straw Hats are being framed for a crime seemingly committed by Nico Robin. As if to put the proverbial icing on the cake, the annual storm Aqua Laguna is on its way toward Water Seven. Manga Chapter(s): 338-339 Anime Episode(s): 239-240

8.SummaryEnglish: Nico Robin appears to be working alongside a World Government shadow organization called CP9. When the Straw Hats learn about Robin's current affiliation, Luffy decides that in order to know the full truth, they must catch Robin and make her talk. Manga Chapter(s): 340-341 Anime Episode(s): 240-241

9.SummaryEnglish: Robin and her tall, mysterious, masked companion arrive at Iceburg's room, and she learns that he possesses blueprints to the ancient weapon Pluton, spoken of in the poneglyphs. Then, shockingly, the members of CP9 unmask themselves. Manga Chapter(s): 342-345 Anime Episode(s): 242-243

10.SummaryEnglish: Luffy's group finally catches up to Robin, but they are greeted by disappointment—Robin opts to stay with CP9 and leave the Straw Hats. As Robin turns away from Luffy, the members of CP9 confronts the pirates. Manga Chapter(s): 346-348 Anime Episode(s): 244-246

11.SummaryEnglish: As Usopp works to repair the Going Merry, he contends with Franky's insistence on dismantling it. During this time, Usopp reflects on who it was that conducted the ship's repairs while in Skypiea, and Franky confirms his suspicions. Manga Chapter(s): 349-352 Anime Episode(s): 246-247

12.SummaryEnglish: In the past, Franky—a.k.a. Cutty Flam—was part of the legendary Tom's Workers, and he and Iceburg helped create the sea train. Spandam, a member of CP5, was determined to get Tom's blueprints for Pluton by any means necessary. Manga Chapter(s): 353-355 Anime Episode(s): 248-249

13.SummaryEnglish: The old fishman Tom was framed by CP5 for the crime of attacking the Navy with Franky's battleships. As the World Government hauled Tom off to Enies Lobby, Franky received a lasting reminder to take pride in the ships he builds. Manga Chapter(s): 355-357 Anime Episode(s): 249-250

14.SummaryEnglish: CP9 hauls away Franky and Usopp, but not before giving a coldhearted farewell to the Merry. At Galley-La’s HQ, Nami learns from Iceburg the truth behind Robin's betrayal and the difficult choice she had to make to save the lives of the Straw Hats. Manga Chapter(s): 358-359 Anime Episode(s): 250-251, 256, 320

15.SummaryEnglish: While the members of Galley-La help Chopper search for Luffy and Zoro, Nami rushes to the departing sea train to keep Robin from sacrificing her freedom. At the station, a man finds Nami and hands her a letter from Sanji. Manga Chapter(s): 360-362 Anime Episode(s): 252-254

16.SummaryEnglish: Sanji coolly fights his way through the sea train and locates Usopp and Franky. Back in Water Seven, Kokoro sees how determined Luffy is to save Robin, so she and Iceburg lend the Straw Hat crew an unexpected helping hand. Manga Chapter(s): 363-365 Anime Episode(s): 254-255

17.SummaryEnglish: Rocketman blasts out of Water Seven and connects with the sea tracks, and old foes become allies for the coming struggle. Aqua Laguna swells, and it's up to Luffy and Zoro to combine their might and create safe passage for all aboard. Manga Chapter(s): 366-367 Anime Episode(s): 256-257

18.SummaryEnglish: Sogeking appears in grand fashion! Wanze threatens Sanji's group with his ramen kenpo, so the Straw Hat cook urges the others ahead. Franky takes on CP9's newest recruit “Sea Weasel” Nero, and Sogeking moves forward to meet up with Robin. Manga Chapter(s): 368-369 Anime Episode(s): 258-259

19.SummaryEnglish: In his battle against Wanze and his strange Ramen Kenpo, Sanji makes an exception to his rule of never using his hands. Meanwhile, Franky and Nero are baffled by each other’s abilities, and back on Rocketman, Zoro clashes with “Ship-Slasher” T-Bone. Manga Chapter(s): 370-371 Anime Episode(s): 259-261

1.SummaryEnglish: As the Straw Hats and their allies approach Enies Lobby on Rocketman, they hatch a plan to save Robin before she passes through the Gates of Justice. Meanwhile, Spandam holds a meeting with CP9 where they await Lucci's return in the Tower of Justice. Manga Chapter(s): 375-376 Anime Episode(s): 263-265

2.TitleEnglish: The Big Showdown on the Judiciary Island!!
2.SummaryEnglish: Luffy launches a one-man assault on Enies Lobby, and the rest of his allies work to break the first gate's defenses. What awaits Galley-La and the Franky Family at the second gate is a showdown of massive proportions! Manga Chapter(s): 377-378 Anime Episode(s): 265-266

3.TitleEnglish: Express to the Main Island of Enies Lobby
3.SummaryEnglish: Robin and Franky are finally brought before Spandam while Luffy continues to blast through waves of marines. Galley-La and the Franky Family still have one giant to deal with, and the main gate closes to halt Rocketman's entry. Manga Chapter(s): 379-380 Anime Episode(s): 266-267

4.SummaryEnglish: The Straw Hats struggle to catch up with Luffy, who is already on the main island wreaking havoc for the Navy. Meanwhile, Robin learns from Spandam that the terms of their deal have changed, and he somehow has rights to a buster call. Manga Chapter(s): 381-382 Anime Episode(s): 268-269

5.SummaryEnglish: Luffy makes it just outside the courthouse when Blueno of CP9 appears before him, and on the main road, the Straw Hats near the courthouse plaza aboard Sodom and Gomorrah. Meanwhile, Sogeking comes across a dejected Oimo. Manga Chapter(s): 383-384 Anime Episode(s): 269-271

6.SummaryEnglish: Kaku and Kalifa of CP9 are offered a rare chance for new powers and are each served a devil fruit. The Straw Hats finally arrive at the courthouse plaza when Spandam receives an urgent call, and he realizes things are much worse than previously reported. Manga Chapter(s): 385-387 Anime Episode(s): 271-273

7.SummaryEnglish: The Straw Hats storm the courthouse where the three-headed judge Baskerville awaits to enact violent judgment upon them. On the roof, Luffy thanks CP9's Blueno for the strength of his opponents, and he activates a new ability. Manga Chapter(s): 388-390 Anime Episode(s): 273-274

8.TitleEnglish: The Girl They Called a Devil
8.SummaryEnglish: Twenty years ago, Nico Robin grew up on Ohara in the West Blue, striving to become an archaeologist like her mother. When Robin met Saul, a giant who washed onto the shores of Ohara, her life would forever be changed. Manga Chapter(s): 391-393 Anime Episode(s): 275-276

9.SummaryEnglish: Robin's mother Olvia was on the run from the World Government, and tragedy was unavoidable from the moment Professor Clover and his colleagues decided to continue their research. No one on Ohara was safe. Manga Chapter(s): 394-396 Anime Episode(s): 276-277

10.SummaryEnglish: To prove his undying loyalty to Robin, Luffy makes a defiant statement to the World Government. Manga Chapter(s): 397-398 Anime Episode(s): 278

11.SummaryEnglish: Franky stages his own rebellious act against Spandam while Luffy's crew makes a daring leap of faith to hopefully gain entrance to the Tower of Justice. Manga Chapter(s): 399-400 Anime Episode(s): 284-285

12.SummaryEnglish: The Straw Hats split up to find the correct key before Robin’s fate is sealed. Zoro finds and engages Kaku in battle, and Sogeking attempts to steal a key from the sleeping Jabra. Manga Chapter(s): 401-402 Anime Episode(s): 286-287

13.SummaryEnglish: Sanji faces his greatest weakness: fighting a beautiful woman! Meanwhile, Franky begins to run low on cola energy, but he must battle the peculiar Fukuro to obtain more of his refreshing fuel from the kitchen. Manga Chapter(s): 403-404 Anime Episode(s): 287-288

14.SummaryEnglish: Refreshed and refueled, Franky turns the tide in his battle with Fukuro. Meanwhile, Zoro and Sogeking must find a way to compensate for their self-imposed handicap, and Chopper unfortunately comes face-to-face with Kumadori. Manga Chapter(s): 405-406 Anime Episode(s): 289-290

15.SummaryEnglish: Chopper's abuse of his rumble balls results in a monstrous side effect. In the meantime, Nami learns how Kalifa's new devil fruit powers sapped Sanji of his strength, and a determined Luffy finally catches up to Spandam, Lucci and Robin. Manga Chapter(s): 407-408 Anime Episode(s): 290-293

16.SummaryEnglish: As the Navy ekes out a comeback against the Straw Hats’ allies, Spandam makes the call Robin most dreaded. In the meantime, Lucci and Luffy begin their mutually anticipated duel, while Nami and Kalifa's fight enters the next phase. Manga Chapter(s): 409-411 Anime Episode(s): 294-295

17.SummaryEnglish: Kalifa attempts to counter Nami’s mirages, and something must be done to save Chopper, still on a monstrous rampage. Zoro, now uncuffed, resumes his duel with Kaku. As Sogeking reaches his limit against Jabra, Sanji reappears, and he is hunting wolves. Manga Chapter(s): 412-413 Anime Episode(s): 296-297

18.SummaryEnglish: As Nami drags the wounded Sogeking from the fight to go find Robin, he suddenly counters with a better idea. In the meantime, Sanji faces off against Jabra's Iron Body Kenpo, and, to break the latter's defenses, Sanji unveils his latest technique. Manga Chapter(s): 414-415 Anime Episode(s): 297-298

19.SummaryEnglish: Spandam drags Robin along the Bridge of Hesitation and finally arrives at the Gates of Justice. Meanwhile, Zoro continues his clash with Kaku, and as things become more desperate, Zoro's rage begins to manifest as a dark aura. Manga Chapter(s): 416-418 Anime Episode(s): 299-301

20.SummaryEnglish: Luffy gives Franky the opening he needs to head for Robin. The cyborg runs into trouble at the start of the bridge, but all is not lost as a lone sniper appears atop the Tower of Justice. Despite these minor victories, the buster call commences. Manga Chapter(s): 419-420 Anime Episode(s): 301-302

21.SummaryEnglish: With time running out, Luffy activates another special ability. The vice admirals of the buster call are shocked to see Luffy taking on Rob Lucci and recall how the CP9 enforcer, even in his youth, held strongly to a dark sense of justice. Manga Chapter(s): 421-422 Anime Episode(s): 302, 304-305

22.SummaryEnglish: Lucci corners Luffy, weakened by his new ability’s aftereffects. Back on the bridge, Spandam makes an attempt on Robin's life, so Franky jumps into action. Meanwhile, the rest of the gang is about to drown in the flooded passageway. Manga Chapter(s): 423-424 Anime Episode(s): 306-307

23.SummaryEnglish: The Straw Hats watch as Enies Lobby burns, and Franky fears for his men when he hears of a successful attack against them. Luffy resumes his fight against Lucci while 200 Navy captains bear down on his crewmates. Manga Chapter(s): 425-427 Anime Episode(s): 307-309

24.SummaryEnglish: Luffy has finally defeated Rob Lucci, and good news arrives that the Franky Family and Galley-La foremen are all alive and well. As the Straw Hats scramble to escape the Navy, they hear a voice telling them to jump into the sea. Manga Chapter(s): 428-429 Anime Episode(s): 310-311

25.SummaryEnglish: Enies Lobby and the buster call fleet are out of sight, but the Going Merry begins to break apart. The Straw Hats are intercepted by Iceburg aboard his company ship and discover how the Merry found her way back to them one last time. Manga Chapter(s): 430 Anime Episode(s): 312

1.TitleEnglish: The Strongest Family Lineage?! The Vice-Admiral and The Revolutionary!
1.SummaryEnglish: Two days later in Water Seven, Franky hears that the item for he purchased with the Straw Hats' stolen money has arrived. While the pirates recover from the events at Enies Lobby, a Navy vice admiral arrives to pay Luffy an unexpected visit. Manga Chapter(s): 431-432 Anime Episode(s): 313-314

2.TitleEnglish: The Extent of the Grand Line and The 600,000,000 Crew!
2.SummaryEnglish: In the New World, not even the Navy’s best can keep Red-Haired Shanks from meeting Whitebeard with an especially important request. Meanwhile, at Water Seven, the Franky Family comes to the Straw Hats with some "bad" news. Manga Chapter(s): 433-435 Anime Episode(s): 315-316, 319-320, 325

3.SummaryEnglish: The Straw Hats have barely had time to marvel at their new bounties when a new surprise awaits them: the unveiling of their magnificent new ship. The next step is bringing a shipwright into their ranks, and there is only one man for the job. Manga Chapter(s): 436-437 Anime Episode(s): 321-322

4.TitleEnglish: The Astonishing Thousand Sunny and Usopp's Tearful Apology!
4.SummaryEnglish: The Straw Hats set sail, but Usopp is conspicuously missing. Zoro soberly reminds Luffy that Usopp's return should not be granted so casually. More immediately, the pirates need to avoid Garp’s barrage of cannon balls! Manga Chapter(s): 438-439 Anime Episode(s): 323-324

5.TitleEnglish: The Circling Bounties and The Duel on Banaro Island!
5.SummaryEnglish: The Straw Hats’ new wanted posters begin circulating around the world, but three days earlier, Blackbeard began plotting their pursuit. However, one obstacle stood in his way; Ace had finally caught up to his estranged crewmate! Manga Chapter(s): 440-441 Anime Episode(s): 324-325

1.TitleEnglish: The Mysterious Sea and The Skeleton Brook!
1.SummaryEnglish: The Thousand Sunny gets flung into the foggy Florian Triangle and the Straw Hats encounter a ruined ship. Speculating as to whether there are ghosts aboard, it turns out the pirates are not far from the truth. Manga Chapter(s): 442-443 Anime Episode(s): 326, 337-339

2.TitleEnglish: Adventure on the Ghost Island and the Famous Doctor Hogback!
2.SummaryEnglish: Brook bids the Straw Hats farewell, and they decide to explore the nearby ghost island Thriller Bark. Freakish danger awaits the landing party the moment they arrive, and, back on the Sunny, the rest of the crew is harassed by an unseen foe. Manga Chapter(s): 444-445 Anime Episode(s): 339-340

3.TitleEnglish: The Invisible Man and the Secret of the Mansion!
3.SummaryEnglish: While staying at Hogback's eerie mansion, Nami is assaulted by an invisible figure in the shower. It does not end there as Usopp battles haunted paintings with a handful of candles. Meanwhile, the rest of the Straw Hats finally make landfall. Manga Chapter(s): 446-448 Anime Episode(s): 340-343

4.TitleEnglish: General Zombie Night! Thriller Bark's Mysterious Four
4.SummaryEnglish: The Straw Hats learn that the head honcho on the island is one of the Seven Warlords, and he has concocted a shadowy scheme. As Absalom rallies the zombies, the master of Thriller Bark awakens. Manga Chapter(s): 449-450 Anime Episode(s): 342-344

5.TitleEnglish: Perona's Wonder Garden and the Charge of the General Zombies!
5.SummaryEnglish: Nami, Usopp, and Chopper manage to escape their coffin but find themselves in a garden surrounded by animal zombies, including one acting remarkably like Sanji. It also seems that one by one, the Straw Hats are disappearing. Manga Chapter(s): 451-452 Anime Episode(s): 345-346

6.TitleEnglish: Number 900?! Lola's Pursuit and the Humming Swordsman
6.SummaryEnglish: Lola attacks Nami out of ignorant jealousy, but the Sanji-esque zombie plays interference. Meanwhile, with Luffy captured, and Franky and Robin left to face a massive spider monkey, a familiar bony figure falls from the sky. Manga Chapter(s): 453-454 Anime Episode(s): 347-348

7.TitleEnglish: The Fearsome Ability of the Shadow Fruit! The Ultimate Number 900!
7.SummaryEnglish: Gecko Moria takes his next step toward his goal of eventually becoming king of the pirates by creating the ultimate zombie. Luffy's shadow in hand, Moria begins the revival of the much-anticipated number 900. Manga Chapter(s): 455-456 Anime Episode(s): 349-350

8.TitleEnglish: Oars' Awakening and Brook vs. Ryuma!
8.SummaryEnglish: Dead for 500 years and left in a deep freeze since, Oars awakens, fueled by Luffy's shadow. Soon after, Nami, Usopp, and Chopper are discovered hiding inside Perona's pet bear, and Absalom abducts Nami for his demented marriage ceremony. Manga Chapter(s): 457-458 Anime Episode(s): 351-353

9.TitleEnglish: The Hope and Despair of the Skeleton and the Straw Hats' Counterattack!
9.SummaryEnglish: The Straw Hats regroup on the Sunny in a pitiable state, but not before Brook leaves Franky with some valuable information. In addition, they now know of the promise Brook made to a certain friend fifty years ago, someone the Straw Hats know well. Manga Chapter(s): 459-460 Anime Episode(s): 353-355

10.SummaryEnglish: Oars' entry into the fight suddenly changes everything! Then, when Perona attacks, only one of the pirates seems to be immune to her negative powers. Due to his glass-half-empty personality, Usopp might have what it takes to defeat the Ghost Princess. Manga Chapter(s): 461-462 Anime Episode(s): 356-357

11.TitleEnglish: A Stolen Dream! Sanji vs. Absalom
11.SummaryEnglish: Sanji crashes Absalom's sham of a wedding, the fire in his heart burning brightly as he rescues Nami. A curious connection between Sanji and the Clear-Clear Fruit is revealed, and he vows to defeat Absalom for ruining his lifelong dream. Manga Chapter(s): 463-464 Anime Episode(s): 357-359

12.TitleEnglish: Perona's Terror! Usopp vs. the Ghost Princess!
12.SummaryEnglish: After getting the stuffing beat out of him by a zombie teddy bear, Usopp summons his sharp-shooting alter ego to help him discover the secret to defeating Perona! He reaches deep into his devious bag of tricks to even the odds in this spooky battle. Manga Chapter(s): 465-466 Anime Episode(s): 360-362

13.TitleEnglish: Zoro vs. Ryuuma and Chopper's Rage!
13.SummaryEnglish: Zoro stands in for Brook and duels Ryuma, the swordsman zombie from faraway Wano. In the mansion, Chopper's former respect for Dr. Hogback is completely erased after coming to realize the man's twisted views on life. Manga Chapter(s): 467-468 Anime Episode(s): 362-363

14.TitleEnglish: Show Yourselves, Straw Hat Pirates! The Crew's Hopeless Counterattack!
14.SummaryEnglish: With Oars now a fully obedient zombie, Gecko Moria takes his leave while instructing the giant to hunt down the pirates, whose wanted posters are sewn onto his arm. One by one, the Straw Hats' battles are interrupted by Oars' march around Thriller Bark. Manga Chapter(s): 469-470 Anime Episode(s): 364-365

15.TitleEnglish: Clash! The Titanic Battle Against Zombie 900!
15.SummaryEnglish: The Straw Hats sans Luffy are faced with the insurmountable task of taking out Oars. To knock him down, Franky decides they will need to use his newly developed tactic. But as they begin "docking" onto one another, a slight problem arises. Manga Chapter(s): 471-472 Anime Episode(s): 365-367

16.TitleEnglish: The Mysterious Visitor! The Two Warlords Meet!
16.SummaryEnglish: While the Straw Hats continue to wear away at Oars, Nami confronts Perona attempting to escape on board the Thousand Sunny, but the sudden appearance of a large, mysterious figure soon makes her efforts moot. Manga Chapter(s): 473-474 Anime Episode(s): 368-369

17.TitleEnglish: Combination of Brains and Brawn! Oars and Moriah vs. the Straw Hats!
17.SummaryEnglish: To give Luffy a fighting chance against Moria, Lola and her pirate crew propose a plan to fight shadow with shadow. Meanwhile, Gecko Moria uses his abilities to enhance and manipulate Oars’ massive body. Manga Chapter(s): 475-476 Anime Episode(s): 370-371

18.TitleEnglish: The Crew's Annihilation! Oars vs. Nightmare Luffy
18.SummaryEnglish: Moria’s strange combination with Oars defeats the Straw Hats one after the other. They are at their breaking point when a powerful figure swoops in and takes up the fight in their stead. The hellish creation: Nightmare Luffy! Manga Chapter(s): 477-479 Anime Episode(s): 371-372

19.TitleEnglish: Morning Comes! The Straw Hats' Ultimate Attack!
19.SummaryEnglish: Oars recovers from Nightmare Luffy's assault, but the Straw Hats all get back on their feet and launch a final devastating attack on Oars. Morning fast approaches, and Moria is far from finished, ready to use his ultimate technique. Manga Chapter(s): 480-482 Anime Episode(s): 373-374

20.TitleEnglish: The Power That Can Deflect Anything?! Zoro Fights Prepared to Die!
20.SummaryEnglish: Moria’s defeat returns the shadows of all his victims. However, one warlord remains on the island, and he has orders to terminate the Straw Hats and everyone else in the area. A lone Zoro faces Kuma in vain and is presented with a deadly choice. Manga Chapter(s): 483-485 Anime Episode(s): 375-377

21.TitleEnglish: Brook's Past! The Rumbar Pirates and Laboon!
21.SummaryEnglish: Brook recalls his past, thinking back on the time when the small whale Laboon started following his pirate ship and befriended the crew. Manga Chapter(s): 486-487 Anime Episode(s): 378-380

22.SummaryEnglish: At death's door, the Rumbar Pirates sang "Binks' Sake" one last time and recorded it in a tone dial, hoping to one day deliver it to Laboon. With their new crewmate and musician Brook on board, the Straw Hats bid farewell to Lola’s crew. Manga Chapter(s): 488-489 Anime Episode(s): 380-381

1.SummaryEnglish: As the Straw Hats journey to Fishman Island, they reach the Red Line, the halfway point along the Grand Line. When a sea king appears, Luffy easily dispatches it, but it spits up a mermaid and a talking starfish onto the deck of the Sunny. Manga Chapter(s): 490-491 Anime Episode(s): 385-386

2.SummaryEnglish: The Straw Hats arrive at Duval's (eerily quiet) base and manage to locate Camie's captured friend. Realizing the captive’s identity, the Straw Hats reluctantly agree to rescue him, and only in exchange for directions to Fishman Island. Manga Chapter(s): 492-493 Anime Episode(s): 387-388

3.SummaryEnglish: Blaming Sanji for his misfortunes, Duval swears vengeance on the Straw Hats. Meanwhile, the Flying Fish Riders attempt to sink the Sunny, but the ship is far from vulnerable. Finally, Sanji himself faces Duval in a bid to end things. Manga Chapter(s): 494-495 Anime Episode(s): 388-389

4.TitleEnglish: Adventure on the Archipelago of Dancing Soap Bubbles
4.SummaryEnglish: The Straw Hats make their way to Sabaody Archipelago to prepare the Sunny for its undersea voyage to Fishman Island. During their search for a coating mechanic, the Straw Hats encounter the Celestial Dragons, the cruel rulers of the World Government. Manga Chapter(s): 496-497 Anime Episode(s): 390-391

5.SummaryEnglish: While at Shakky’s Rip-off Bar, the Straw Hats learn that Luffy, Zoro and nine other rookie pirates on Sabaody have reached a certain level of infamy. Later, Zoro has a close call with an insufferable and sadistic Celestial Dragon. Manga Chapter(s): 498-500 Anime Episode(s): 392-394

6.SummaryEnglish: Nami's group arrives at the Grove 1 auction house where Camie will be sold to the highest bidder. With 200 million belly in hand, Nami is determined to win back their friend. The auction wears on as Luffy and the others race to the grove. Manga Chapter(s): 501-502 Anime Episode(s): 395-396

7.SummaryEnglish: As chaos erupts inside the auction house, a mysterious man with an equally mysterious power emerges from backstage. But now, due to Luffy’s insolent actions, a Navy admiral is on his way to Sabaody. Manga Chapter(s): 503-504 Anime Episode(s): 397-398

8.SummaryEnglish: The Navy surrounds the auction house, and super rookies Monkey D. Luffy, Eustass Kid, and Trafalgar Law all want a piece of the action. Later, Rayleigh reveals his shocking past to the Straw Hats. Manga Chapter(s): 505-506 Anime Episode(s): 399-400

9.SummaryEnglish: Luffy and his crew decide to lay low in town while Rayleigh coats the Sunny. Meanwhile, Admiral Kizaru from Navy HQ arrives on the archipelago in search of those responsible for threatening the Celestial Dragons. Manga Chapter(s): 507-508 Anime Episode(s): 400-401

10.SummaryEnglish: While four super rookies square off against Kizaru, the Straw Hats combine their strongest attacks to defeat the Pacifista menacing them. The battle is barely won when yet another, deadlier foe comes to take its place. Manga Chapter(s): 509-511 Anime Episode(s): 402-404

11.SummaryEnglish: In the face of overwhelming danger, Luffy orders a full retreat. However, Warlord Kuma cuts off their frenzied escape and uses a harrowing touch of his devil fruit powers against Luffy’s crewmates, one by one. Manga Chapter(s): 512-513 Anime Episode(s): 404-405

1.TitleEnglish: Adventure on the Island of Women
1.SummaryEnglish: Luffy finds himself alone, stranded and starving on an unfamiliar island. After a run-in with some exotic mushrooms, he is approached by a team of female warriors who could be friend... or foe. Manga Chapter(s): 514-515 Anime Episode(s): 408-409

2.SummaryEnglish: Luffy storms the village of women in hopes of acquiring a boat. However, a misstep lands him in the personal bath of none other than the Snake Princess. As he peers through the steam rising from its waters, he sees a forbidden secret etched upon her back. Manga Chapter(s): 516-517 Anime Episode(s): 410-411

3.SummaryEnglish: Luffy is sentenced to execution by arena combat with Boa Hancock’s serpentine sisters. Luffy soon discovers that the two women have a mysterious ability that allows them to slither through all his attacks unharmed. Manga Chapter(s): 518-519 Anime Episode(s): 412-413

4.SummaryEnglish: Impressed by Luffy’s efforts to protect the secret of the snake sisters, Hancock reveals the story behind the familiar mark on their backs. Their childhood was tragic, suffered at the hands of a corrupt group that Luffy knows all too well. Manga Chapter(s): 520-522 Anime Episode(s): 414-417

5.TitleEnglish: No One Can Stop This Now
5.SummaryEnglish: As Luffy prepares to depart Amazon Lily, Hancock suddenly takes ill. Taking heed of the knowledge and wisdom of Elder Nyon, the Snake Princess “recovers,” and a plan to save Ace is quickly hatched. Manga Chapter(s): 523-524 Anime Episode(s): 417-421

1.SummaryEnglish: To rescue his brother Ace, Luffy must infiltrate the well-guarded prison Impel Down. He eludes the watchful eyes of security for a time, and then, for better or worse, a certain red-nosed criminal appears. Manga Chapter(s): 525-526 Anime Episode(s): 422-423, 454

2.SummaryEnglish: After forming an unlikely alliance, Luffy rushes through Impel Down aided by Buggy's powers. Meanwhile, Ace finds himself with an unlikely companion as well when he exchanges words with a powerful pirate prisoner. Manga Chapter(s): 527-528 Anime Episode(s): 424-425, 430

3.SummaryEnglish: Luffy and his dubious companions face off against the mythical beasts of Level 2. Impel Down is put on lockdown, its only exit sealed, but Luffy, unaware and unafraid, continues to Ace's floor, only to have another unexpected reunion. Manga Chapter(s): 529-531 Anime Episode(s): 425, 430-432

4.SummaryEnglish: Luffy and his deranged team pummel everything from Level 3 to Level 4 that dares to stand in their path. However, the powerful guard Minotaurus is ready to do some pummeling of his own while a boiling bath of blood awaits below. Manga Chapter(s): 532-533 Anime Episode(s): 433-434

5.SummaryEnglish: With nowhere to run, Luffy's desperation to save Ace forces him to make a very grim sacrifice against his venomous adversary. Down in the frozen depths of Level 5, Bon Kurei rushes to his friend's aid, betting on a distant hope. Manga Chapter(s): 534-536 Anime Episode(s): 435-438, 446

6.SummaryEnglish: Bon Kurei wanders through Level 5 in search of a mysterious missing prisoner. However, the fearsome wolves and bitter cold eventually take their toll, and he collapses in the Freezing Hell, all while Luffy's life continues to dwindle away. Manga Chapter(s): 537-538 Anime Episode(s): 438-440

7.SummaryEnglish: Luffy is back in action, and he prepares to set off, now with even more powerful allies who have ties to his old man. When they reach the lowest level of Impel Down, the legendary Level 6, they are in for a few new surprises. Manga Chapter(s): 539-540 Anime Episode(s): 440-443

8.SummaryEnglish: A veritable all-star team on his side, Luffy and co. battle their way back up to Level 4. On Level 2, a massive riot erupts, plunging the prison into chaos. To further complicate matters, another infamous pirate breaks into Impel Down. Manga Chapter(s): 541-543 Anime Episode(s): 443-446

9.SummaryEnglish: It is utter chaos in Impel Down, and between the sudden appearance of Blackbeard, the vice warden’s interference, and Magellan’s dogged attempts to restore order, the escape team just might see daylight yet! Manga Chapter(s): 544-546 Anime Episode(s): 446-450

10.SummaryEnglish: Thanks to Jinbe’s quick thinking, Luffy and co. narrowly escape Impel Down. However, the Gates of Justice remain closed, and a horde of Navy ships is gaining on them. Then, just when all hope seems lost, a dear friend makes an all-or-nothing gamble. Manga Chapter(s): 547-548 Anime Episode(s): 450-451

1.SummaryEnglish: Fifty warships, 100,000 marines, the Seven Warlords, and three admirals: Akainu, Aokiji, and Kizaru. The stage is set, and, as a battle with Whitebeard looms, Fleet Admiral Sengoku reveals a shocking truth about Ace. Manga Chapter(s): 549-550 Anime Episode(s): 452, 459

2.SummaryEnglish: To the surprise of the Navy, the Moby Dick surfaces in the middle of Marineford! On the deck stands Whitebeard, the man who Ace calls father, and his 14 commanders, the pirates he calls family, who share Luffy’s determination to stop the execution. Manga Chapter(s): 551-552 Anime Episode(s): 459-462

3.SummaryEnglish: The players have assembled at last! Whitebeard unleashes a tsunami that is set to swallow every marine and turn Navy HQ upside down. The fight has just begun, as Navy admirals and pirate commanders alike showcase their incredible abilities. Manga Chapter(s): 553-554 Anime Episode(s): 462-463

4.SummaryEnglish: A larger-than-life ally risks his life to pave the way forward, and the Whitebeard Pirates rush toward Ace. However, just as their rescue mission picks up momentum, Sengoku employs a surprise tactic that turns the tide yet again. Manga Chapter(s): 555-556 Anime Episode(s): 464-465

5.SummaryEnglish: Luffy leaps into the fray! Battling against familiar faces and new foes alike, he races toward the scaffold like a whirlwind of destruction, and, as his brother begs for him to turn back, Luffy shares some powerful words of his own. Manga Chapter(s): 557-558 Anime Episode(s): 467-468

6.SummaryEnglish: Facing Kuma on the battlefield, Ivankov reveals their shared past, but his pleas to his old companion fall on deaf ears as Kuma continues his attacks. In a sea of confusion, only Doflamingo seems to know the truth. Manga Chapter(s): 559-560 Anime Episode(s): 468-469

7.SummaryEnglish: Luffy’s progress is halted by Mihawk, but the Whitebeard Pirates counter with a swordsman of their own. Then, when an army of human weapons encircle the battlefield, Luffy and his allies find themselves overwhelmed by their explosive attacks. Manga Chapter(s): 561-562 Anime Episode(s): 470-471

8.TitleEnglish: The Man Who Shook the World
8.SummaryEnglish: Squard’s betrayal of Whitebeard sends ripples of distrust and uncertainty throughout the pirate alliance. And yet, Whitebeard’s faith will not be shattered, and it soon becomes clear that his allies are falling into a clever setup launched by the Navy. Manga Chapter(s): 563-564 Anime Episode(s): 472-473

9.SummaryEnglish: The pirates are trapped in the bay, held there by Akainu’s magma. Amid the chaos, the order for Ace’s execution is given, and Luffy makes a drastic decision that puts him face-to-face with the Navy’s most powerful men. Manga Chapter(s): 565-566 Anime Episode(s): 474-475

10.SummaryEnglish: His adopted son within reach, Whitebeard charges forth, undeterred by the strongest the Navy has to offer. With both sides swinging between victory and defeat, the battlefield plunges into chaos. Then Marco takes to the sky and soars to Ace’s side! Manga Chapter(s): 567 Anime Episode(s): 476

11.SummaryEnglish: Faced with the might of the admirals, even Whitebeard's commanders falter. Refusing to relent, Luffy begs Ivankov for a final chance at victory. Amid a bevy of marines, an old friend of Luffy’s appears for a much too premature reunion. Manga Chapter(s): 568-569 Anime Episode(s): 477-478

12.SummaryEnglish: Having borne witness to Luffy’s latent powers, the Navy sends everything they have at him. But thanks to Ivankov’s quick thinking, Luffy ascends toward Ace. Garp, unable to watch any longer, leaps into Luffy’s path. Manga Chapter(s): 570-571 Anime Episode(s): 479-480

13.SummaryEnglish: Ace is free at last, and the pair of brothers are unstoppable! Although the Whitebeard Pirates are emboldened by their teamwork, their captain is not convinced that their escape will come so easily, and Whitebeard makes a difficult decision. Manga Chapter(s): 572-573 Anime Episode(s): 481-482

14.SummaryEnglish: Ace protects his brother from Akainu but suffers a mortal blow in the process. Jinbe and the Whitebeard Pirates rush to his aid but soon realize he is far beyond help. As Ace takes his final breaths, he imparts a heartfelt message. Manga Chapter(s): 574 Anime Episode(s): 483-484

15.SummaryEnglish: Blackbeard appears, Thatch’s murder and Ace’s capture all part of a terrifying plan that no one could have imagined! With the war in its final stage, Whitebeard fights to avenge his fallen sons and to punish the traitor who plotted his undoing. Manga Chapter(s): 575-576 Anime Episode(s): 484-485

16.TitleEnglish: A Gift to a New Era
16.SummaryEnglish: Though Ace and Whitebeard have been killed, the Navy seeks to wipe out every last pirate, even as they retreat. In the confusion, Akainu sets his eyes on the unconscious Luffy. Meanwhile, Blackbeard reveals his true scheme and a terrifying new power! Manga Chapter(s): 577-578 Anime Episode(s): 486-487

17.SummaryEnglish: Senseless violence dyes the battlefield red with blood. Luffy’s allies struggle to save him as the admirals maintain their assault. Suddenly, the Red Hair Pirates appear! Narrowly missing a reunion with Luffy, Shanks utters a speech on the battlefield. Manga Chapter(s): 579-580 Anime Episode(s): 488-489

1.SummaryEnglish: The Summit War has thrown the entire world into chaos. Emboldened by Whitebeard's final words, pirates once again envision a wave they can ride into a new era. At Hancock’s order, Luffy is taken to Amazon Lily to hide from the Navy while he recovers. Manga Chapter(s): 581-582 Anime Episode(s): 490-491

2.SummaryEnglish: Before they were brothers, Ace and Luffy lived in the mountains, dreaming of the day when they would take to the sea. In the criminal-infested junkyard known as Gray Terminal, Ace and his partner-in-crime Sabo robbed the thieves and scavengers. Manga Chapter(s): 583-584 Anime Episode(s): 493-495

3.SummaryEnglish: Ace, Sabo, and Luffy made a promise to one another over cups of sake that would shape their futures. Yet while the brothers' adventures continue, Sabo's unfortunate past catches up with him. Meanwhile, a horrific plot unfolds. Manga Chapter(s): 585-586 Anime Episode(s): 496-498, 500-501, Episode of Sabo

4.SummaryEnglish: Even as the fires in Gray Terminal threatened to consume them, Ace and Luffy fought Bluejam with all their might! In the wake of the tragedy, Sabo seized freedom in his hands and took to the sea, just as a Celestial Dragon arrived in High Town. Manga Chapter(s): 587-588 Anime Episode(s): 501-503

5.SummaryEnglish: Luffy and Ace buried their sorrow and grew stronger day by day as they trained to be pirates. Time marched on, and they eventually bade farewell to their childhood home and took to the sea, hoping to achieve the dream that Sabo could not. Manga Chapter(s): 589-590 Anime Episode(s): 503-505

6.SummaryEnglish: Determined to return to Sabaody and keep his promise to his crew, Luffy prepares for departure. However, when Dark King Rayleigh appears and makes him a surprising offer, Luffy is forced to make a decision that could alter the fate of his entire journey. Manga Chapter(s): 591-592 Anime Episode(s): 507-510

7.SummaryEnglish: Although Navy HQ is in ruins after the Summit War, marines and reporters still stalk its grounds. Luffy, Rayleigh, and Jinbe return to where Ace died to carry out a mysterious plan. If all goes well, Luffy’s crew will understand his actions. Manga Chapter(s): 593-594 Anime Episode(s): 510-512

8.SummaryEnglish: The Straw Hat Pirates have interpreted their captain's message to meet up again in two years. During this time, they will prepare themselves for the New World! In the Calm Belt, Luffy arrives in Luscaina to begin training under Rayleigh. Manga Chapter(s): 595-597 Anime Episode(s): 513-516

1.SummaryEnglish: Two years after the Summit War, the Straw Hat crew finally returns to Sabaody. However, the archipelago has changed, and with dangerous pirates lurking around in droves, their departure to the New World may not go as smoothly as hoped. Manga Chapter(s): 598-599 Anime Episode(s): 517-519

2.SummaryEnglish: Luffy, in disguise, crosses paths with the fake Luffy, and the imposter finds himself on the receiving end of a mysterious power. Meanwhile, Sentomaru and the Navy have yet again amassed a team of Pacifistas. Manga Chapter(s): 599-600 Anime Episode(s): 518-520

3.SummaryEnglish: After two long years and one chaotic afternoon, the Straw Hats are finally ready to renew their voyage. However, before they can set off to Fishman Island, they must contend with a massive Navy force determined to stop them. Manga Chapter(s): 601-602 Anime Episode(s): 520-522

1.TitleEnglish: Into the Depths! The Kraken and the Caribou Pirates
1.SummaryEnglish: Encased in a protective bubble, the Sunny departs for Fishman Island far under the sea. As the Straw Hats marvel at the sights, Franky tells the crew about their greatest ally in their time apart. But suddenly, a mysterious shadow closes in on the ship. Manga Chapter(s): 603-604 Anime Episode(s): 523-524

2.TitleEnglish: Adventure in the Ocean Depths! 10 Kilometers Below the Surface!
2.SummaryEnglish: Luffy, Zoro, and Sanji leave the relative safety of the Sunny to face the Kraken in its own territory. Putting their powerful new skills to work, they survive the encounter but are swept away by a downward current and become lost in the murky depths. Manga Chapter(s): 605-606 Anime Episode(s): 524-526

3.TitleEnglish: Landing on Fishman Island! The Mermaid Cove and Gyoverly Hills!
3.SummaryEnglish: After a near miss with a creepy undersea ship and Fishman Island in sight, Luffy’s crew is halted by a group of fishmen riding atop sea kings. But time is of the essence, so the Straw Hats attempt a desperate maneuver. Manga Chapter(s): 607-608 Anime Episode(s): 526-527

4.TitleEnglish: Arrival at Coral Hill! The Nosebleed and the Devastating Prediction!
4.SummaryEnglish: The mermaids of Fishman Island give The Straw Hats a warm welcome, but Sanji is struck with a sudden medical emergency! Luffy and co. take their anemic friend to the Mermaid Cafe to rest, where they are introduced to its soothsaying owner. Manga Chapter(s): 609-610 Anime Episode(s): 528-529

5.TitleEnglish: The King of Fishman Island Invited to Ryugu Palace!
5.SummaryEnglish: The pirates receive an unexpected invitation to Ryugu Palace from Neptune himself, king of Fishman Island. Tempted by the smell of food, Luffy wanders the palace and soon finds an enormous tower with a sturdy yet battle-worn door. Manga Chapter(s): 611-612 Anime Episode(s): 530-531

6.TitleEnglish: The Mermaid Princess in Hard-Shell Tower! Shirahoshi of the Neptune Family!
6.SummaryEnglish: Plagued by the unwanted advances of a lunatic fishman with a dangerous power, Mermaid Princess Shirahoshi has been hidden away in a lonely tower for years. Meanwhile in the palace, things take a sour turn for the Straw Hats. Manga Chapter(s): 613-614 Anime Episode(s): 532-533

7.TitleEnglish: The Shirahoshi Kidnapping Incident and the Curse of the Mato Mato!
7.SummaryEnglish: Ryugu Palace falls into chaos. While Luffy escapes with Shirahoshi, the pirates who infiltrated its walls attack with a strange desperation. After a scuffle of their own, Sanji and Chopper come across an old friend with troubling injuries. Manga Chapter(s): 614-615 Anime Episode(s): 533-534

8.TitleEnglish: The Beginning of the Vengeful Plan! Zoro vs. Hody!
8.SummaryEnglish: Hody’s plan for revenge is set in motion, and the Straw Hats who have unwittingly taken control of the palace must now defend it against the New Fishman Pirates. Outside, Luffy’s excursion with Shirahoshi is rudely interrupted. Manga Chapter(s): 616-618 Anime Episode(s): 535-537

9.TitleEnglish: At the Sea Forest! Arlong and Hody
9.SummaryEnglish: Jinbe reunites with Luffy in the undersea forest and reveals a shocking connection to an old foe. The former warlord begins a tale of when two famous figures fought to undo the animosity that existed between humans and fishmen. Manga Chapter(s): 619-620 Anime Episode(s): 538-539

10.TitleEnglish: Otohime, Fisher Tiger, and the Sun Pirates! The Fateful Encounter!
10.SummaryEnglish: Queen Otohime tried to lead the Ryugu Kingdom into an era of coexistence between humans and fishmen. At the same time, the heroic Fisher Tiger battled humans to free their slaves from captivity. Manga Chapter(s): 621-622 Anime Episode(s): 540-541

11.TitleEnglish: The Shocking Truth of Tiger! The End of the Sun Pirates
11.SummaryEnglish: Fisher Tiger’s past quickly caught up to him, and he left his crew with a sobering, final command. While Jinbe vowed to uphold Tiger’s and Otohime’s ideals, Arlong’s resentment only grew, and soon, the Sun Pirates faced a crisis of identity. Manga Chapter(s): 623-624 Anime Episode(s): 543-545

12.TitleEnglish: The Shipwrecked Celestial Dragon! A Bullet That Seals the Future
12.SummaryEnglish: The sudden appearance of a Celestial Dragon almost imperiled Fishman Island, but Queen Otohime’s ability to end hostilities provided a ray of hope for everyone. Just when the path to the future seemed bright, a shot echoed through the plaza. Manga Chapter(s): 625-626 Anime Episode(s): 545-546

13.TitleEnglish: Shaking of the Kingdom! Luffy vs. Jinbe!
13.SummaryEnglish: After completing his tale, Jinbe begs Nami for forgiveness. Soon after, Hody broadcasts across all of Fishman Island, and all watch in horror as he conducts his hostile takeover. Luffy is ready to fight, but Jinbe has something else in mind. Manga Chapter(s): 627-629 Anime Episode(s): 547-550

14.TitleEnglish: Gyoncorde Plaza Gathering! The Evil Drug's True Power
14.SummaryEnglish: Hody experiences a strange side effect of the energy steroids, and his body undergoes a horrifying transformation! The three princes of the Ryugu Kingdom rush to the scene, but Hody's crewmates have a dirty trick up their sleeves. Manga Chapter(s): 630-631 Anime Episode(s): 550-551

15.TitleEnglish: Hody's Dark Secret! The Straw Hats' Arrival
15.SummaryEnglish: Shirahoshi and Jinbe hurry to free King Neptune but run headlong into a trap. There, Hody reveals a shocking truth about the history of his revolution, but even in the face of Hody’s cruelty, Shirahoshi holds true to her mother’s dying wish. Manga Chapter(s): 632-633 Anime Episode(s): 552-553

16.TitleEnglish: 100,000 vs. 10! The Straw Hats' Explosive Moves
16.SummaryEnglish: The Straw Hats have reassembled at last, an army of New Fishman Pirates standing before them. With the last two years still fresh in their minds, the Straw Hats’ training is put to the test, and they unleash a flurry of new techniques. Manga Chapter(s): 634-635 Anime Episode(s): 554-556

17.TitleEnglish: The General from the Future Land and the Crisis of Fishman Island's Destruction
17.SummaryEnglish: Franky’s mechanical masterpieces have transformations in store that can only be described as "super!" However, onlookers curb their enthusiasm when a foreboding shadow is cast upon Gyoncorde Plaza by a giant ship hurtling toward the island! Manga Chapter(s): 636-637 Anime Episode(s): 556-558

18.SummaryEnglish: Shirahoshi flees into the open sea, hoping to draw the Noah away from Fishman Island. Luffy follows her, but he must contend with Hody Jones along the way. Luckily, the appearance of a new ally gives Luffy a chance to protect Shirahoshi. Manga Chapter(s): 638-639 Anime Episode(s): 559-560

19.SummaryEnglish: The Straw Hats face and hold their own against the powerful officers from Hody’s crew. But their struggle will be in vain if Luffy cannot stop the Noah. Meanwhile, Hody becomes stronger than ever. Manga Chapter(s): 640-641 Anime Episode(s): 561-562

20.SummaryEnglish: Neptune’s army aids the Straw Hats against the New Fishman Pirates, finally accepting the crew as allies. As the fight continues, Fukaboshi’s transponder snail reveals the bone chilling truth behind Hody's motivations. Manga Chapter(s): 642-645 Anime Episode(s): 562-567

21.SummaryEnglish: Luffy has a fist of fire with Hody’s name on it, and the rest of the Straw Hats push forward with all their might. Hody takes even more energy steroids, and a gravely injured Luffy struggles to overcome the fishman's unbelievable stamina. Manga Chapter(s): 643-646 Anime Episode(s): 562-567

22.SummaryEnglish: Hody is vanquished, the Noah is stopped, and Fishman Island is saved! Unfortunately, Luffy was gravely injured in the process. With no time to spare, a true friend steps forward to tear down the walls of the island's history. Manga Chapter(s): 647-649 Anime Episode(s): 567-569
