23.TitleEnglish: The Voice from the New World
23.SummaryEnglish: When pirates working for Big Mom appear, Fishman Island falls under threat from an adversary even stronger than Hody. Luffy steps up to save the fishmen once again but may doom himself by antagonizing one of the strongest pirates in the New World. Manga Chapter(s): 650-651 Anime Episode(s): 570-571

24.SummaryEnglish: Filled with both excitement and trepidation, the crew finally sets sail for the New World. After bidding their fond farewells, the Straw Hats leave with a new log pose in hand. Overcoming trials and tragedies, Luffy's dream is on course once again! Manga Chapter(s): 652-653 Anime Episode(s): 572-573

1.SummaryEnglish: Fresh off the adventure at Fishman Island, the Sunny is caught in a massive whirlpool and dragged off course. A desperate cry for help leads the Straw Hats to Punk Hazard, an island engulfed in flames and inhabited by a mythic beast. Manga Chapter(s): 654-655 Anime Episode(s): 574, 579

2.SummaryEnglish: Luffy, Robin, Usopp, and Zoro face a powerful dragon, and Luffy gets up close and personal with a torso-less figure. Elsewhere, Nami, Sanji, Chopper, and Franky find themselves imprisoned with the pieces of a human face! Manga Chapter(s): 656-658 Anime Episode(s): 580-583

3.SummaryEnglish: Luffy’s group finds themselves up against a gang of centaurs, Brook battles an aggressive mysterious torso, and Vice Admiral Smoker encounters someone highly unexpected! Meanwhile, Nami and Chopper seek a safe exit for a group of children. Manga Chapter(s): 659-660 Anime Episode(s): 583-585

4.SummaryEnglish: Luffy’s group takes a deadly plunge into icy waters, and Trafalgar Law uses his unique abilities to rearrange Nami’s group and place the Straw Hats into a state of chaos! Then, things heat up when G-5 squares off with Law. Manga Chapter(s): 661-662 Anime Episode(s): 585-587

5.SummaryEnglish: Luffy is excited to once again cross paths with Trafalgar Law. While Vice Admiral Smoker determines his next move, an exceptionally large pirate with alligator legs tells Luffy and the Straw Hats the true story of Punk Hazard’s mysterious transformation! Manga Chapter(s): 663-664 Anime Episode(s): 588-589

6.SummaryEnglish: The giant children fly into a mysterious rage, and Chopper discovers the true reason for their unusual condition! Meanwhile, Zoro, Brook, and Sanji cross paths with a dangerous duo, and the story of how Trafalgar Law arrived at Punk Hazard is revealed. Manga Chapter(s): 665-666 Anime Episode(s): 591-592

7.SummaryEnglish: Luffy agrees to an unexpected alliance with Trafalgar Law, but the Straw Hats refuse to leave the island until the children are safe. Meanwhile, the gaseous master of the island unleashes something extremely deadly! Manga Chapter(s): 667-668 Anime Episode(s): 593-594

8.TitleEnglish: Blizzard with a Chance of Slime
8.SummaryEnglish: Zoro, Sanji, and Brook continue their search for the samurai, and Law tries to sneak Chopper into the laboratory! And then, Luffy’s battle with his old nemesis Smoker is interrupted by the arrival of a terrifying toxic blob. Manga Chapter(s): 669-670 Anime Episode(s): 595-596

9.SummaryEnglish: Law's plan to infiltrate Caesar’s facility hits a snag when an unexpected guest complicates things. Meanwhile, Chopper investigates the master’s lab, and the mysterious samurai shows what he can do with a full body! Manga Chapter(s): 671-672 Anime Episode(s): 597-598

10.TitleEnglish: Vergo and Joker! The Beginning of Caesar's Masterplan!
10.SummaryEnglish: Caesar gathers his young test subjects, shocking secret identities are revealed, and the poisonous purple blob continues its march across the island! Meanwhile, Nami and Usopp get an unexpected helping hand in their fight to save the children. Manga Chapter(s): 673-674 Anime Episode(s): 599-600

11.SummaryEnglish: A candy addiction leads the children to return, and Caesar plans to show the world his new and improved Smiley! Luffy and the Straw Hats next find themselves pursued by a deadly cloud of gas that turns living things into statues of ash! Manga Chapter(s): 675-676 Anime Episode(s): 601-602

12.SummaryEnglish: Law has a trick up his sleeve that turns the tide in the alliance’s favor, to include an on-the-spot partnership with former foes. Zoro and company reunite with Nami and Sanji, and it is all Luffy’s group can do to ensure everyone’s safety in the lab. Manga Chapter(s): 677-678 Anime Episode(s): 603-604

13.SummaryEnglish: Law has a trick up his sleeve that turns the tide in the alliance’s favor, to include an on-the-spot partnership with former foes. Zoro and company reunite with Nami and Sanji, and it is all Luffy’s group can do to ensure everyone’s safety in the lab. Manga Chapter(s): 677-678 Anime Episode(s): 603-604

14.TitleEnglish: The Mastermind in the Shadows and the Battle Between Gas and Rubber!
14.SummaryEnglish: Law finds the room that could ruin the New World, and Luffy hopes to bring Caesar’s reign of terror to a brutal end! With Law's true ambitions revealed, Doflamingo flies into action to protect his criminal operation! Manga Chapter(s): 681-682 Anime Episode(s): 607-608

15.TitleEnglish: Vice Admiral vs. Vice Admiral and the Truth Behind Punk Hazard's Destruction!
15.SummaryEnglish: Smoker attacks the estranged Vice Admiral Vergo for assaulting his men, and in the trash heap, Luffy meets something strange. Meanwhile, Caesar’s bloated words to his men about the island’s history do not match what occurred. Manga Chapter(s): 683-684 Anime Episode(s): 609-610

16.TitleEnglish: The Dragon Named Momonosuke and the Menacing Snow Fruit User!
16.SummaryEnglish: Luffy befriends a dragon that used to be a human boy, and Vice Admiral Smoker continues his brutal battle with the villainous Vergo. Mocha tries to keep the master’s candy away from her friends, and Zoro pits his steel against snow in a battle with Monet. Manga Chapter(s): 685-686 Anime Episode(s): 611-612

17.TitleEnglish: Zoro's Strongest One-Sword Style and Mocha's Plight!
17.SummaryEnglish: Zoro vs. Monet: a duel to the bitter end. But when Tashigi comes to lend a hand, she will need her full might to compensate for Zoro's weakness. Meanwhile, Mocha is running out of options for keeping the candy away from the children. Manga Chapter(s): 687-688 Anime Episode(s): 613-614

18.TitleEnglish: Luffy and Law's All-out Attack! The Takeover of the New Era!
18.SummaryEnglish: Brownbeard heroically attempts to expose Caesar as a villain, and the horrific truth about Punk Hazard is finally revealed! Luffy makes Caesar pay for his crimes against the children, and Smoker risks his life for a chance to see Vergo fall in battle! Manga Chapter(s): 689-690 Anime Episode(s): 615-616

19.TitleEnglish: The Strongest Grizzly Magnum and the Assassins from Dressrosa!
19.SummaryEnglish: Law concludes his epic battle with Vergo, and Luffy looks to land a devastating blow on the murderous gasbag mastermind. Meanwhile, word of Luffy and Law’s alliance spreads throughout the world, and Joker sends a team to rescue Caesar. Manga Chapter(s): 691-692 Anime Episode(s): 617-618

20.TitleEnglish: Die for Me! The Dangerous Man Makes His Move!
20.SummaryEnglish: As the Straw Hats and co. flee the crumbling laboratory, Caesar’s desperate act of vengeance thwarts Joker’s plan to forever silence his enemies. Franky continues his battle with Buffalo and Baby 5, and Usopp takes a shot at capturing Caesar. Manga Chapter(s): 693-695 Anime Episode(s): 619-621

21.TitleEnglish: The Alliance's Target and the Departure!
21.SummaryEnglish: Bitter enemies set aside their differences to enjoy a well-deserved feast. The weary marines and the rescued children get teary-eyed as they say goodbye to the Straw Hats. Meanwhile, Law enters into treacherous negotiations with Joker. Manga Chapter(s): 696-697 Anime Episode(s): 622-623

22.TitleEnglish: The Arrival of the Mysterious Man and the News Coo!
22.SummaryEnglish: Doflamingo—a.k.a. Joker—arrives on the scene and wreaks havoc! Only an icy intercession can save Smoker and send Joker off to rethink his strategy. Meanwhile, the Sunny sails through the rough seas of the New World where even a bit of hail portends doom! Manga Chapter(s): 698-699 Anime Episode(s): 624-626, 628

1.TitleEnglish: Arriving at Dressrosa! The Country of Passion, Love, and Toys!
1.SummaryEnglish: Dressrosa! The Straw Hats split up and set about their business on this passionate, enchanting island! But here, in the heart of enemy territory, danger lurks around every corner. Luffy’s group encounters an intriguing blind man whose luck has run dry. Manga Chapter(s): 700-701 Anime Episode(s): 628-631

2.SummaryEnglish: Zoro and co. strike off in search of the thieving fairy who has taken Zoro's sword, but Sanji gets distracted by the alluring dancing of a gorgeous Dressrosan. Meanwhile, the prize of the late Ace’s devil fruit draws Luffy and Franky to the colosseum. Manga Chapter(s): 702-703 Anime Episode(s): 631-633

3.TitleEnglish: The Colosseum of Many New Faces and Maynard the Pursuer!
3.SummaryEnglish: Luffy enters the tournament at Corrida Colosseum to compete for Ace's fruit, but with the mightiest warriors of the New World assembled and standing in his way, the competition will not be easy. The first stage of the competition is a battle royal! Manga Chapter(s): 704-705 Anime Episode(s): 633-635

4.TitleEnglish: Bellamy's Changed Motivations and B Block's Start!
4.SummaryEnglish: When Block A concludes, the crowds are shocked to discover the secret identity of the winner. Block B commences, and the widely despised Bartolomeo takes the ring, but he will have to contend with Dressrosa's own local favorite, Bellamy! Manga Chapter(s): 706-707 Anime Episode(s): 634-637

5.TitleEnglish: B Block on Fire! Outlandish Competitors and King Punch!
5.SummaryEnglish: The battle in Block B hits a crescendo as the Fighting King Elizabello II prepares his devastating King Punch! But as the powerful attack becomes imminent, the Kingdom of Prodence faction unravels! Manga Chapter(s): 708-709 Anime Episode(s): 637-638

6.TitleEnglish: To Green Bit! The Adventure in the Land of Dwarves!
6.SummaryEnglish: The Caesar Transfer Team is on approach to Green Bit, but the colossal coastal fish of Dressrosa are biting, and the connecting bridge has collapsed! The team gathers their wits to make it across, but they soon discover they are not alone on the island. Manga Chapter(s): 710-711 Anime Episode(s): 639-642

7.SummaryEnglish: All but done for, Sanji is trapped by Violet and her crew when she suddenly changes her mind and mysteriously turns on her own men! Sanji gets in touch with Law to share a shocking secret that could unsettle all their plans in Dressrosa. Manga Chapter(s): 712-713 Anime Episode(s): 640-643

8.TitleEnglish: Closely Contested Block C! Lucy and Ucy!
8.SummaryEnglish: The Sunny is mysteriously deformed by Giolla’s strange powers! Meanwhile, the battle for Block C is under way, but Luffy suffers a staggering setback. He eventually knocks down the giant Hajrudin, but Chinjao has his sights set on Garp’s grandson! Manga Chapter(s): 714-715 Anime Episode(s): 643-645

9.TitleEnglish: C Block's Blazing Battle and the Forgotten of Dressrosa!
9.SummaryEnglish: In the colosseum, Chinjao finally faces Luffy and reveals the old grudge he bears against Garp! Meanwhile, Usopp and Robin get swept up in the Tontattas' raid against the royal family, and Franky learns the eerie secret of Dressrosa’s living toys. Manga Chapter(s): 716-717 Anime Episode(s): 646-647

10.TitleEnglish: The Tontatta Rebellion and the C Block Finale!
10.SummaryEnglish: The Tontattas gear up for their all-out assault on the Doflamingo Family, and Usopp and Robin are caught up in the war effort! Meanwhile, Luffy concludes his earth-shattering fight to the death with Don Chinjao. Manga Chapter(s): 718-719 Anime Episode(s): 648-649

11.TitleEnglish: A Sad Past! Rebecca and Soldier-san
11.SummaryEnglish: A voice from the past unsettles Luffy and sends him into a rage! Also, the agenda of colosseum gladiator Rebecca is exposed, her eternal bond with the one-legged toy soldier linked to the violent overthrow of the old regime by none other than Doflamingo! Manga Chapter(s): 720-721 Anime Episode(s): 650-651

12.TitleEnglish: D Block's Fiery Start and the Heavenly Demon's Revelation!
12.SummaryEnglish: As Rebecca enters the ring for the battle for Block D, the crowd shows its contempt for her heritage and vicious contenders set their sights on her. Meanwhile, Law is pinned by Fujitora, and Doflamingo has the upper hand. Manga Chapter(s): 722-723 Anime Episode(s): 652-654

13.TitleEnglish: Law's New Strategy and the Colosseum's Underground Nightmare!
13.SummaryEnglish: Law must put himself in harm's way to defend the Sunny and the Straw Hats from Doflamingo's all-out assault. Meanwhile, Bartolomeo searches the colosseum for Luffy and discovers something strange about the medical center for the defeated. Manga Chapter(s): 724-725 Anime Episode(s): 655-657

14.TitleEnglish: The Plight of the Riku Clan! The Lurking Hero Awaits in the Shadows!
14.SummaryEnglish: The losers of the colosseum who are being held below the infirmary have an unexpected addition to their numbers. Meanwhile, the history of Tontatta is made clear, as is the shocking identity of the toy soldier! Manga Chapter(s): 726-727 Anime Episode(s): 648, 657-659

15.SummaryEnglish: Revealed is the sad fate of King Riku, his army, and his daughter, Princess Viola, as well as how the people of Dressrosa fell into the hands of Doflamingo. Not to mention, all the toys in the country share a mysterious secret. Manga Chapter(s): 728-729 Anime Episode(s): 660-661

16.SummaryEnglish: Zoro and Kin'emon make a mad dash to save Law, but Admiral Fujitora stands in their way, bringing his full power against them. The toy soldier lays out the plan to liberate the Tontattas and bring down the Doflamingo Family: Operation SOP. Manga Chapter(s): 730-731 Anime Episode(s): 657, 662-663

17.SummaryEnglish: Usopp and Robin travel via an underground tunnel dug by the tiny people of the Tontatta Tribe. On the surface, Franky makes his way to the Toys House to cause a distraction to help his crewmates, but standing in his way is quite the guy! Manga Chapter(s): 732-733 Anime Episode(s): 664-665

18.SummaryEnglish: Viola, once a princess of the Dressrosan royal family, shows Luffy and the others a secret entrance into the palace. In the meantime, Admiral Fujitora reveals his audacious plans for the Seven Warlords of the Sea! Manga Chapter(s): 734-735 Anime Episode(s): 666-667

19.SummaryEnglish: The final round at Corrida Colosseum kicks off, and Diamante joins the combatants in an all-out struggle to win the prize! Meanwhile, Luffy and co., en route to Doflamingo, are faced with an immovable member of the Donquixote Family. Manga Chapter(s): 736-737 Anime Episode(s): 668-670

20.SummaryEnglish: With Operation SOP in its final stage, the Tontattas are devastated by Trebol’s furious attack, but as Usopp tries to convince Leo to abort the operation, Leo tells him about their commander’s stunning true identity. Manga Chapter(s): 738-739 Anime Episode(s): 670-672

21.SummaryEnglish: With the Tontattas beaten, Robin turned into a toy, and Luffy, Franky, and the others busy elsewhere, Usopp is the last hope for Operation SOP! Among the cries of the Tontattas, Usopp has a difficult decision to make. Manga Chapter(s): 740-741 Anime Episode(s): 672-675

22.SummaryEnglish: Usopp creates a miracle! Toys across Dressrosa regain their true forms, a flood of lost memories return, and a forgotten hero launches a long overdue attack on the villainous tyrant Doflamingo! Manga Chapter(s): 742-743 Anime Episode(s): 675-678

23.SummaryEnglish: Sabo makes a risky move to end the championship battle, and Luffy hurries to free Law. Doflamingo's apparent defeat has thrown Dressrosa into chaos, but he may have a trick or two left up his sleeve. Manga Chapter(s): 744-745 Anime Episode(s): 678-680

24.SummaryEnglish: Doflamingo announces the rules for his deadly game with the highest bounty reserved for… Usopp! As Luffy and co. head toward the palace, Fujitora stands in their way, and Pica emerges in town to change the stakes of the game. Manga Chapter(s): 746-747 Anime Episode(s): 681-683

25.SummaryEnglish: The game is afoot, and Luffy finds that the dastardly warlord has more enemies than he might realize! Strangely, an argument breaks out to decide who gets the honor of taking down Doflamingo once and for all! Manga Chapter(s): 748-749 Anime Episode(s): 683-686

26.SummaryEnglish: Law's reason for despising Doflamingo is revealed! Luffy heads toward Doflamingo's refuge, making his way through the guards, while down below Admiral Fujitora faces off against Sabo, who is now armed with a familiar fiery power! Manga Chapter(s): 750-751 Anime Episode(s): 685-688

27.SummaryEnglish: Heavy hitters from the colosseum turn from wringing each other's necks toward a unified plan, which might be just enough to give Luffy the chance he needs to make it to a final showdown with Doflamingo. Manga Chapter(s): 752-753 Anime Episode(s): 688-691

28.SummaryEnglish: Cavendish shares his fears that the "Birdcage" game Doflamingo is playing has been rigged all along! Meanwhile, the Tontattas are in full revolt, Zoro finally gains the upper hand against Pica, and Franky finds a way to deal with Senor Pink. Manga Chapter(s): 754-755 Anime Episode(s): 691-693

29.SummaryEnglish: Gladius' exploding spheres send Robin and Bartolomeo hurtling directly into Luffy and co.’s battle with some creepy dolls. Rebecca makes it to the Flower Field alone, and Sabo tastes Fujitora's full might! Manga Chapter(s): 756-757 Anime Episode(s): 693-696

30.SummaryEnglish: Luffy and Law finally surmount incredible odds to land themselves in striking distance of Doflamingo. However, Sugar stands in their way, so Usopp uses Viola's clairvoyance to prepare his ammunition to take her out. Manga Chapter(s): 758-759 Anime Episode(s): 694, 696-698

31.SummaryEnglish: All hopes rest on Luffy and Law being able to take down Doflamingo; however, the warlord has other plans in mind as he gives the two the fight of their lives, and he reveals his true, shocking history! Meanwhile, Sabo finds out Fujitora’s true intention. Manga Chapter(s): 760-761 Anime Episode(s): 699-700

32.SummaryEnglish: A rage born from the lies of the World Government created a child who had the will to try and kill Corazón! Law was accepted into the Doflamingo Family, but Corazón's mysterious silence hid a fact that just may have saved Law's life. Manga Chapter(s): 762-763 Anime Episode(s): 701-702

33.SummaryEnglish: Things grew stranger for Law when he learned the secret behind why Corazón feigned being mute. But the mysterious Corazón’s actions were only beginning to baffle Law when he took him on a journey to cure the youth’s disease. Manga Chapter(s): 764-765 Anime Episode(s): 703-704

34.SummaryEnglish: Corazón had finally obtained the Op Op Fruit! Doflamingo and his Family were zeroing in on Corazón and Law's whereabouts, so Corazón hid Law long enough to let him escape, even at the risk of his own life. Manga Chapter(s): 766-767 Anime Episode(s): 705-706

35.SummaryEnglish: Luffy continues to fight the Doflamingo doppelganger but keeps accidentally attacking Bellamy instead. Meanwhile, the tide of battle turns against Law as painful scars from the past resurface, and Zoro gets unexpected help in his battle with Pica. Manga Chapter(s): 768-769 Anime Episode(s): 707-709

36.TitleEnglish: The Spear of Elbaf and Don Sai
36.SummaryEnglish: Hajrudin has been beaten down, but a fire still burns within him to pay back the favor he owes! Lao G and Don Chinjao bring their most devastating attacks to bear, but a misunderstanding caused by Baby 5 has Sai and Don Chinjao distracted. Manga Chapter(s): 770-771 Anime Episode(s): 708-711

37.SummaryEnglish: A mysterious force that resembles Cavendish menaces the battlefield! While it appears to help Bartolomeo and co. at first, it soon sets its sights on Robin! As he continues to battle Gladius, Bartolomeo is faced with an impossible dilemma. Manga Chapter(s): 772-773 Anime Episode(s): 711-713

38.SummaryEnglish: Senor Pink and Franky continue their knock-down, drag-out, manly fight. As both are pushed to their limits, Senor Pink's tragic past is revealed! Meanwhile, Princess Mansherry's rescue hits a snag as she stubbornly refuses to leave! Manga Chapter(s): 774-775 Anime Episode(s): 714-716

39.SummaryEnglish: Pica loses his temper and becomes a terrible and true force of nature. With the lives of King Riku, Usopp, and the others in the balance, Zoro must dig deep and discover a powerful technique to counter Pica's near-unstoppable onslaught. Manga Chapter(s): 776-778 Anime Episode(s): 716-719

40.SummaryEnglish: The Tontattas finish demolishing the SMILE Factory and taking down Bellamy only enrages Luffy in his fight against Doflamingo, his anger multiplying when he finds Law's lifeless body! Meanwhile, the birdcage draws ever tighter around Dressrosa. Manga Chapter(s): 779-781 Anime Episode(s): 720-723

41.SummaryEnglish: Law summons enough energy to speak, denouncing the Doflamingo Family executives as pawns in Doflamingo's game. Meanwhile, neither Gear Second nor Gear Third attacks are working against Doflamingo, so Luffy decides to use something stronger! Manga Chapter(s): 782-783 Anime Episode(s): 723-725

42.SummaryEnglish: The birdcage tightens its grip on Dressrosa, so Zoro sets off with a plan to stop it from slicing apart the country. Meanwhile, Luffy digs deep into his training to provide an answer born of rubber and haki to combat Doflamingo’s might. Manga Chapter(s): 784-785 Anime Episode(s): 726-728

43.SummaryEnglish: Using Boundman drains Luffy of his haki, leaving him in need of a rest. Luckily, the colosseum combatants run interference while he recharges, and Sabo steps in at a crucial moment to defend his brother. Manga Chapter(s): 786-787 Anime Episode(s): 728-730

44.SummaryEnglish: With just over a minute to spare, everyone in Dressrosa turns their efforts toward slowing the birdcage. Meanwhile, Rebecca, under the control of Doflamingo, advances to attack Viola, and a hero’s recovery cannot come soon enough! Manga Chapter(s): 788-790 Anime Episode(s): 730-733

45.SummaryEnglish: The people of Dressrosa shed tears of joy as they remember the hardships endured and the actions taken to free them. As they beg King Riku to resume the crown, Admiral Fujitora shocks onlookers with an unexpected display of humility. Manga Chapter(s): 791-793 Anime Episode(s): 734-736

46.SummaryEnglish: The combatants in the battle for Dressrosa can finally begin to recoup, but those who stay awake are treated to the story of how Sabo joined the Revolutionary Army and how he reunited with his brother Luffy at the colosseum. Manga Chapter(s): 794-795 Anime Episode(s): 737-739

47.SummaryEnglish: Major players in the Navy arrive to search Dressrosa for the Straw Hats, and Rebecca's history is whitewashed with a cover story. Luffy and the others make a mad dash for the east port, but not before finishing up a piece of business. Manga Chapter(s): 796-797 Anime Episode(s): 740-742

48.SummaryEnglish: Law and Sengoku share memories of Corazón and the secret of Trafalgar Law's name. Luffy and the others finally make their break from the island; however, an unbelievable new chapter opens in the story of the Straw Hat Pirates! Manga Chapter(s): 798-800 Anime Episode(s): 742-745

1.SummaryEnglish: The mysterious island of Zou approaches in the distance, obscured by fog. When the haze clears, what greets them is beyond anyone’s expectations! Luffy and co. find the Sunny nearby, but the rest of the crew has already disembarked. Manga Chapter(s): 801-803 Anime Episode(s): 746-747, 751-753

2.SummaryEnglish: The mysterious "island" may hold more danger than was bargained for, as Luffy and co. learn they are not alone! Luffy pushes deeper into the mysterious forest, but he is treading territory where he is not welcome. Manga Chapter(s): 804-805 Anime Episode(s): 753-754

3.SummaryEnglish: Luffy and co. ride out the Rain-ruption and learn of its vital role in maintaining life on Zou. As they continue toward the fortress, they learn more about the mysterious Minks, and are finally reunited with the others. Manga Chapter(s): 806-807 Anime Episode(s): 755-757

4.SummaryEnglish: The Straw Hats finally meet the daytime ruler of this strange land. They learn more about the battle that took place here and discover the mysterious system by which the island is ruled. Manga Chapter(s): 808-809 Anime Episode(s): 757-760

5.SummaryEnglish: While they put up a good fight, the Minks were not able to subdue Jack. In the aftermath of Jack's deadly attack, Chopper and Sanji rushed in to save the fallen Minks and enlisted the help of Caesar to overcome the lingering gas problem. Manga Chapter(s): 810-811 Anime Episode(s): 759-762

6.SummaryEnglish: The mystery of Sanji's disappearance only deepens as Luffy learns that Big Mom’s lackeys caught up with him and offered him an invitation from one of the Four Emperors that simply could not be refused. Manga Chapter(s): 812-813 Anime Episode(s): 762-764

7.SummaryEnglish: Being separated from one of his crew is more than Luffy is willing to tolerate! The pirates make their way toward the nighttime ruler to find out more about their friend's disappearance. Manga Chapter(s): 814-815 Anime Episode(s): 764-766

8.SummaryEnglish: Revelations abound as the true nature of the men from Wano and their relationship with the Minks is revealed, and Momonosuke's role is greater than any had imagined. But even more shocking is the visage of a real ninja! Manga Chapter(s): 816-817 Anime Episode(s): 767-769

9.TitleEnglish: Momonosuke, Heir of the Kozuki Family
9.SummaryEnglish: More mysteries of the Kozuki Clan are revealed, and its retainers propose an alliance to help topple one of the Four Emperors: Kaido of the Beast Pirates! But first, Luffy has some important Straw Hat business to attend to. Manga Chapter(s): 818-819 Anime Episode(s): 769-772

10.SummaryEnglish: The Straw Hats divide and conquer: one group to go save Sanji, and the other to Wano! But just before their departure, the tremendous elephant quakes as Jack’s fleet launches an aggressive attack on the monstrous Zunesha. Manga Chapter(s): 820-822 Anime Episode(s): 772-774, 776

1.SummaryEnglish: Luffy's team—plus a stowaway—sets out from Zou on their way to win back Sanji. Meanwhile, the leading families and leaders of the world make their way to the Holy Land, Mary Geoise, for a pivotal round table conference. Manga Chapter(s): 823-824 Anime Episode(s): 777-779, 783

2.SummaryEnglish: Without Sanji to properly identify safe and edible food, Luffy gets a stomach full of poisonous fish! With no antidotes on board, the Straw Hats must rely on a couple of mysterious—yet somehow familiar—passersby for help. Manga Chapter(s): 825-826 Anime Episode(s): 783-785

3.SummaryEnglish: Arriving on Cacao Island, Luffy and Chopper are in heaven as everything before their eyes is edible. There, the Straw Hats encounter Sanji’s betrothed, Pudding, but when they challenge her for Sanji's heart, her answer is truly shocking. Manga Chapter(s): 827-828 Anime Episode(s): 785-788

4.SummaryEnglish: Big Mom ravages Whole Cake Island in search of sweets, and while a familiar face across the waters has just what she needs, he also brings ill tidings. As the Straw Hats draw closer to the island, Pedro shares his sordid past in Big Mom’s territory. Manga Chapter(s): 829-830 Anime Episode(s): 788-790

5.SummaryEnglish: Luffy’s group makes its way toward Sanji, only to be distracted by the endless supply of sweets and a second Luffy. Before they realize it, they are lost in the Seducing Woods! Meanwhile, Sanji confronts his older brother. Manga Chapter(s): 831-832 Anime Episode(s): 791-793

6.SummaryEnglish: Sanji faces his father in a duel as the wounds of his childhood are laid bare! Meanwhile, Luffy falls for the illusions of the forest, and Big Mom has Caesar at her whims, ready to use him to continue her maniacal pursuits. Manga Chapter(s): 833-834 Anime Episode(s): 793-795

7.SummaryEnglish: The mysterious half-buried man comes clean about his identity, but this must all be put aside when one of Big Mom's most powerful commanders comes calling. Nami's past exploits, however, hold the key to keeping the baddies at bay. Manga Chapter(s): 835-836 Anime Episode(s): 796-798

8.SummaryEnglish: Luffy squares off against a commander of Big Mom, Charlotte Cracker, whose powers may prove more troublesome than they appear. Meanwhile, Brook and Pedro infiltrate Whole Cake Island and work out a plan to avoid getting caught. Manga Chapter(s): 837-838 Anime Episode(s): 798-800

9.SummaryEnglish: Sanji challenges his entire family, but they have effectively ensured he follows their wedding scheme. The truth of Germa's power and Vinsmoke Judge’s dark history is also revealed. Meanwhile, Nami has recruited the homies and challenges Cracker! Manga Chapter(s): 839-840 Anime Episode(s): 800-803, 807

10.SummaryEnglish: Sanji’s tragic history included a rare moment of compassion that was his only chance at escape, but even then, his father’s cruelty haunted him. In the present, Reiju helps Sanji straighten himself out before he meets with his fiancée. Manga Chapter(s): 841-842 Anime Episode(s): 804-806

11.SummaryEnglish: Luffy finishes off Cracker and finally catches up with Sanji, but the Straw Hats’ cook seems far from thrilled about the reunion. A heartbreaking duel commences, but a steadfast Luffy makes a solemn vow to his friend and crewmate. Manga Chapter(s): 843-844 Anime Episode(s): 806-808

12.SummaryEnglish: Luffy stands his ground and waits for Sanji to return, but as the vengeful army washes over him, only a true friend can step in to help. At Big Mom’s castle, Sanji and Pudding discuss their marriage and come to a startling conclusion! Manga Chapter(s): 845-846 Anime Episode(s): 809-812

13.SummaryEnglish: Pedro creates a diversion for Brook to put his soulful plan into action. Meanwhile, the captured Luffy continues to goad Big Mom, and Pudding has the beginnings of rebellion stirring up inside her. Manga Chapter(s): 847-848 Anime Episode(s): 812-815

14.SummaryEnglish: When Pudding arrives to meet the captured Luffy and Nami, their hopefulness suddenly turns to shock! To make matters worse, Brook comes face to face with Big Mom herself! At the risk of his own well-being, Luffy desperately tries to free himself. Manga Chapter(s): 849-850 Anime Episode(s): 814-817

15.SummaryEnglish: Things are looking grim for Luffy and Nami until an unexpected ally appears. Elsewhere, Sanji confronts his sister about what Pudding plans to do and learns the powerful secret of their mother's undying love. Manga Chapter(s): 851-852 Anime Episode(s): 817-820

16.SummaryEnglish: Luffy fights through more obstacles in search of Sanji, and Brook hears Big Mom's plan firsthand as she shares her intentions with Pudding. While Big Mom's agents believe most of the Straw Hats to be under their control, Mont d'Or has his doubts. Manga Chapter(s): 853-854 Anime Episode(s): 820-822

17.SummaryEnglish: Nami and co. finally locate Brook using the Mirro-world, but he is in the most inopportune of places! Meanwhile, Luffy is waylaid on his way back to the rendezvous, and Jinbe shares the awful truth about the wedding with the other Straw Hat pirates. Manga Chapter(s): 855-856 Anime Episode(s): 823-825

18.SummaryEnglish: Jinbe tells the Straw Hats about Capone “Gang” Bege and proposes a shocking plan to take down Big Mom! But before they are granted an audience with Bege, they must make themselves presentable. Manga Chapter(s): 857-858 Anime Episode(s): 826-828

19.SummaryEnglish: The plan for Big Mom’s assassination is all set. Sanji heads back to his room to avoid suspicion, but Mont d’Or is hot on his trail. The day arrives, and guests from the criminal underground pour in in droves, some with their own agendas to settle. Manga Chapter(s): 859-860 Anime Episode(s): 828-830

20.SummaryEnglish: Final preparations abound, plans come together, and Sanji meets his bride on the altar. As the veil is lifted off Pudding's face, emotions run high, and the chaos begins! As the proverbial icing on the cake, all hell breaks loose as Luffy charges in! Manga Chapter(s): 861-862 Anime Episode(s): 831-832

21.SummaryEnglish: The wedding and the precious cake crumble to pieces around Big Mom as a slew of Luffys wreak havoc. The chaos pushes Big Mom past the edge of sanity, so her children make a move against Germa while Pudding takes aim at Sanji. Manga Chapter(s): 863-864 Anime Episode(s): 831, 833-834

22.SummaryEnglish: Luffy dashes toward Big Mom to show her the broken portrait again, and Sanji attempts to free his family. Here, Big Mom’s tragic and sad history is revealed: from the very beginning, Big Mom's voracious hunger has brought her into conflict with others. Manga Chapter(s): 865-866 Anime Episode(s): 835-836

23.SummaryEnglish: A young Linlin managed to enrage the giants of Elbaf, but Mother Carmel begged for clemency on her behalf. After Carmel’s mysterious disappearance, Linlin fell in with a new cohort and found her reason to go on living. Manga Chapter(s): 867-868 Anime Episode(s): 837-839

24.SummaryEnglish: The Straw Hats and Germa 66 become cornered in Bege's stronghold, and the full might of the Big Mom Pirates is pinning them down! It is only a matter of time before their defenses crack, so they take the only way out and make a break for it. Manga Chapter(s): 869-870 Anime Episode(s): 839-841

25.SummaryEnglish: Caesar flies the entire alliance, still inside Bege, out of the venue! However, the full might of the Big Mom Pirates proves too much. The alliance’s annihilation is imminent, but something shakes the playing field. Manga Chapter(s): 870-872 Anime Episode(s): 841-843

26.SummaryEnglish: The Straw Hats continue their mad dash to the Sunny, and Pudding puts her plan to rebuild the cake into action. As Zeus pursues the Straw Hats, Nami keeps him occupied with a shocking surprise that might stop Big Mom in her tracks! Manga Chapter(s): 873-874 Anime Episode(s): 843-846

27.SummaryEnglish: Big Mom is relentless in her pursuit of the Straw Hats. Elsewhere, the plan to recreate the wedding cake progresses while Pudding’s unpredictable heart confuses everyone, including herself. Manga Chapter(s): 875-876 Anime Episode(s): 846-848

28.TitleEnglish: Mink Pedro, Captain of the Guardians
28.SummaryEnglish: Sandwiched between Big Mom and her advancing fleet, the only hope left to the Sunny is to blast right through it all. Meanwhile, Pedro comes face-to-face with his past and does what he must to ensure the success of his friends. Manga Chapter(s): 877-878 Anime Episode(s): 848-850

29.SummaryEnglish: In the Mirro-world, Luffy confronts the formidable Charlotte Katakuri, Big Mom’s strongest child. Meanwhile, Pudding and Sanji arrive at Cacao Island to remake the cake, but they bicker like a married couple the whole time. Manga Chapter(s): 879-880 Anime Episode(s): 851-853

30.SummaryEnglish: Nami and Luffy discuss a rendezvous point while the others break the mirrors on the Sunny. Little do they know their plan is overheard, and Luffy’s grueling battle against Katakuri—haki vs. haki, rubber vs. mochi—intensifies. Manga Chapter(s): 881-883 Anime Episode(s): 853-855, 858

31.SummaryEnglish: Katakuri retires to his sanctuary to enjoy a merienda—a sweet chance to replenish his haki! But he is not the only one munching away. A mochi mountain has crushed Luffy, and he has found a delectable way to escape. Manga Chapter(s): 883-884 Anime Episode(s): 856-858

32.SummaryEnglish: When Chiffon comes under attack, Sanji must choose between defending her or revealing his whereabouts to his enemies. Elsewhere, Luffy uses Charlotte Brûlée as a human shield to avoid the wrath of Big Mom. Manga Chapter(s): 885-886 Anime Episode(s): 858-860

33.SummaryEnglish: Sanji and Bege contend with Charlotte Oven, who boils the sea itself! Meanwhile, a vicious pincer attack bears down on the Straw Hats, but Carrot draws on a deep power within and springs to action under the light of the full moon. Manga Chapter(s): 887-888 Anime Episode(s): 860-862

34.SummaryEnglish: Wielding Napoleon and backed by Zeus and Prometheus, Big Mom wreaks havoc on the Sunny. As the Straw Hats try to kick out the emperor, their ship catches fire! But then, Jinbe steps up to the plate to take a swing. Manga Chapter(s): 889-891 Anime Episode(s): 862-865

35.SummaryEnglish: The cake is finally brought before Big Mom. With the end of her vicious rampage in sight, the Straw Hats may just get their chance to flee! Big Mom's crew is forced to decide who to attack, and Luffy grows ever closer to mastering his haki. Manga Chapter(s): 891-893 Anime Episode(s): 865-868

36.SummaryEnglish: Desiring revenge after complete embarrassment, Big Mom’s children band together to smash the Straw Hats. Meanwhile, Luffy and Katakuri are locked in a duel to end all duels, where each blow could be the last. Manga Chapter(s): 892-895 Anime Episode(s): 865, 867-870

37.SummaryEnglish: Luffy's dramatic battle finally draws to a close, and a whole host of the Big Mom Pirates watch the last mirror to see who will come through. Manga Chapter(s): 896-897 Anime Episode(s): 871-872

38.SummaryEnglish: Sanji tries his best to save himself and his captain. Now, the fate of Totto Land rests on the taste of the wedding cake! With the help of Germa and the Sun Pirates, the Straw Hats see their chance to escape! Manga Chapter(s): 898-900 Anime Episode(s): 873-875

39.SummaryEnglish: As the Big Mom Pirate fleet approaches, Jinbe makes a crucial decision. At a great cost of energy and life, the Straw Hats make it out of Totto Land. Left behind in their wake are allies, friends, and would-be lovers. Manga Chapter(s): 901-902 Anime Episode(s): 876-877

1.SummaryEnglish: Luffy’s reputation grows as all eyes look toward the Straw Hats’ next move. Meanwhile, the royals of the world make their way to the Reverie, but their absence welcomes a raid by a vicious band of pirates on the Kingdom of Lulucia. Manga Chapter(s): 903-904 Anime Episode(s): 878-880

2.SummaryEnglish: At New Marineford, Fleet Admiral Sakazuki hears the news about Luffy while nobles from around the world gather for the Reverie! At the Red Line, Garp is escorting King Neptune’s family when Shirahoshi sees the surface world for the first time. Manga Chapter(s): 905-906 Anime Episode(s): 881-885

3.SummaryEnglish: As the Reverie commences, Emperors Big Mom and Kaido both set their sights on Luffy! Meanwhile, a mysterious outsider visits the highest authority in the world, and the Revolutionary Army confirms its desire to save Kuma. Manga Chapter(s): 907-908 Anime Episode(s): 886-889

1.SummaryEnglish: Luffy and the others see familiar faces in a newspaper article about the Reverie right as they approach Wano. However, this dangerous and foreboding land is as inaccessible as it is mysterious, with the sea itself acting as a barrier! Manga Chapter(s): 909-910 Anime Episode(s): 890-891

2.SummaryEnglish: A mysterious country, a rampaging slasher, an ancient samurai ritual of seppuku—and Zoro in the crosshairs! Stranded alone on the beach, Luffy tries to gather his bearings only to be confronted by some dangerous local fauna. Manga Chapter(s): 909-911 Anime Episode(s): 892-894

3.SummaryEnglish: Otama recounts her promise to Ace while Luffy rushes her to medical attention. But just as they reach the wasteland, a familiar face comes into view, and Kaido's underlings show up, too! Manga Chapter(s): 911-912 Anime Episode(s): 894, 897

4.SummaryEnglish: Luffy and Zoro are stalled by Hawkins, but their fortune looks bright when a woman guides them to a teahouse. There, they find an herbal remedy for the river poison that Otama drank, while old acquaintances look on from a distance. Manga Chapter(s): 913 Anime Episode(s): 898-899

5.SummaryEnglish: Otama is kidnapped by Kaido’s gifters and taken to a flourishing settlement called Bakura Town where a creepy-looking headliner was expecting her. Luffy, Zoro, and the samurai Okiku rush to her rescue. Manga Chapter(s): 914-915 Anime Episode(s): 900-902

6.SummaryEnglish: Luffy challenges Urashima, the strongest yokozuna in Wano, to a sumo match! However, Urashima is willing to resort to illegal moves. Meanwhile, Holdem tells Otama that he must punish her for a crime she committed. Manga Chapter(s): 915-916 Anime Episode(s): 902-903

7.SummaryEnglish: Luffy and co. finally find Otama hanging from the mouth of a lion in Holdem’s stomach. Luffy prepares to save Otama from Kaido’s lackey, and elsewhere, a mysterious figure confronts Basil Hawkins. Manga Chapter(s): 916-917 Anime Episode(s): 904-905

8.SummaryEnglish: Zoro and the others dash out of Bakura Town on the treasure ship filled with food! Luffy catches up to them, and together, they distribute food and water to the people of Okobore Town. Later, Law takes them to the ruins of a hilltop castle. Manga Chapter(s): 918-919 Anime Episode(s): 906, 908-909

9.SummaryEnglish: Kin’emon tells Luffy and the others about how Kozuki Oden brought peace to Kuri and became its daimyo. However, he was set up by Kaido and Orochi. When Kin’emon ran to save Oden’s wife, she revealed a shocking truth. Manga Chapter(s): 919-920 Anime Episode(s): 909-911

10.SummaryEnglish: Ashura Doji, a.k.a Shutenmaru, is one of the allies Kin’emon wants to search for, and he leads a raid on Okobore Town to steal the food that Luffy brought. This unrest prompts the drunken Kaido to fly above Okobore Town in his dragon form. Manga Chapter(s): 921-922 Anime Episode(s): 911-913

11.SummaryEnglish: Infuriated by Kaido’s violence toward his allies, Luffy lands blow after blow on the drunken emperor. When he activates Gear Fourth and launches even more powerful attacks, Kaido fights back. Law tries to rescue Luffy but is interrupted by Hawkins. Manga Chapter(s): 922-923 Anime Episode(s): 914-915

12.SummaryEnglish: Luffy is sent to a great mine where prisoners must endure harsh, forced labor. There, he has an unexpected reunion. Meanwhile, Okiku rushes to the ruins of Oden Castle to confirm the safety of the Straw Hats and the others. Manga Chapter(s): 924 Anime Episode(s): 916

13.SummaryEnglish: Perona prepares to leave Gloom Island after she finds out that her captain, Gecko Moria, is still alive. Meanwhile, Moria raids the island Hachinosu with his zombie army to retrieve his old friend from Blackbeard. Manga Chapter(s): 925-926 Anime Episode(s): 917-919, 924

14.SummaryEnglish: In the Prisoner Mining Camp, Luffy’s and Kid’s competition garners the wrong kind of attention. Meanwhile, Sanji’s soba becomes immensely popular, but gang members disturb his business and knock over a customer’s bowl. Manga Chapter(s): 926-927 Anime Episode(s): 919-922

15.SummaryEnglish: Wano’s top courtesan Komurasaki is in procession and slowly makes her way to Orochi Palace. Sanji and the others are among a crowd on the street. While everyone is fascinated by the oiran, some seeking vengeance get in her way. Manga Chapter(s): 928-930 Anime Episode(s): 921-923

16.SummaryEnglish: In the Flower Capital, a member of the Beast Pirates, Page One, attacks every soba restaurant in the city in search of Sanji. The Straw Hat’s cook faces Kaido’s headliner while using Germa’s device for the first time to hide his identity. Manga Chapter(s): 930-931 Anime Episode(s): 923-926

17.SummaryEnglish: At the shogun’s banquet, the oiran’s child attendant Otoko bursts with laughter and cannot stop. The enraged Shogun Orochi attacks her, but an unexpected person stands in his way. To end the to-do, Kyoshiro takes matters into his own hands. Manga Chapter(s): 932-933 Anime Episode(s): 926-928

18.SummaryEnglish: Chopper’s group is off to rescue Luffy from the Prisoner Mining Camp, but the Straw Hat captain is in a bit of a bind. While Luffy tries to save old man Hyo from execution, Queen the Plague comes to visit the prison. Manga Chapter(s): 934-935 Anime Episode(s): 929-931

19.SummaryEnglish: Luffy fights in an endless sumo match to protect old man Hyo, and Nami, Robin, and Shinobu are cornered as Hawkins raids the bathhouse. Elsewhere, Zoro faces a samurai who accuses him of stealing Shusui, but their duel is interrupted by a woman’s scream. Manga Chapter(s): 936-938 Anime Episode(s): 931-934

20.SummaryEnglish: The wounded Zoro wakes up to find out the shocking identity of the woman he saved and is told the unbelievable tale of 20 years earlier. Meanwhile, Luffy’s “training” is not getting anywhere, but a surprising person gives him his first lesson. Manga Chapter(s): 938-940 Anime Episode(s): 934-936

21.SummaryEnglish: The smiling man Tonoyasu leaves all who met him mystified, what with his familiar terms of address and his shocking knowledge of the rebellion. In Udon prison, Luffy continues his new haki training, and during a brief respite, Raizo appears before him. Manga Chapter(s): 940-941 Anime Episode(s): 936-938

22.TitleEnglish: Shimotsuki Yasuie, the Daimyo of Hakumai
22.SummaryEnglish: The smiling Tonoyasu has been strung up and awaits his inevitable execution, and all of Wano is shocked to find out who he really is. The citizens cry out in outrage, and the doomed man raises his voice in a final act of rebellion against Shogun Orochi. Manga Chapter(s): 941-943 Anime Episode(s): 939-940

23.SummaryEnglish: The truth behind the smiles of the Ebisu villagers finally comes to light, the Shogun and Kaido’s plan revealed! And in Udon Luffy and Hyo are shocked to see Captain Kid return in chains alongside a smiling newcomer. Manga Chapter(s): 943-944 Anime Episode(s): 941-943

24.SummaryEnglish: A very big and hungry visitor arrives at Udon looking for Superstar Queen’s sweet red bean oshiruko, and Rasetsu town is in a full-blown riot with the Straw Hats at the center! Manga Chapter(s): 945 Anime Episode(s): 942-944

25.SummaryEnglish: To Chopper’s surprise, the kind and sweet Olin—a.k.a. Emperor Big Mom—has proven her power to be just as devastating as ever. Olin’s hunger pangs just about reach their limit, and Luffy must act quickly before his mechanical collar executes him. Manga Chapter(s): 946-947 Anime Episode(s): 945-947

26.SummaryEnglish: Babanuki unleashes an unthinkable weapon, and a mysterious figure emerges from a forbidden cell to save Luffy. Then, Old Man Hyo emboldens Raizo and Kiku to reveal their true identities and give the desperate prisoners some much-needed hope. Manga Chapter(s): 948-949 Anime Episode(s): 947-949

27.SummaryEnglish: In Udon, an unexpected person stands up to bring the prisoners renewed hope! Elsewhere, Zoro and Hiyori are pursued by ninja, Orochi is told of Trafalgar Law’s capture, and the people of the Flower Capital prepare for the upcoming Fire Festival. Manga Chapter(s): 950-951 Anime Episode(s): 950-951

28.SummaryEnglish: Kanjuro takes Yasuie’s body to bury him with Oden, and Robin, Usopp, and Brook cleverly pass a checkpoint. While Big Mom and Kaido clash at Onigashima, Old Man Hyo finds his former allies in Udon. And in Ringo, Zoro faces Gyukimaru once more. Manga Chapter(s): 951-953 Anime Episode(s): 952-953

29.SummaryEnglish: Zoro runs after the warrior-monk who took Shusui, and Kawamatsu shares his memory of a fox that was guarding the graves in Ringo. Soon, they find a room filled with swords, and Hiyori tells Zoro to give Shusui back to the Land of Wano. Manga Chapter(s): 953-954 Anime Episode(s): 954-955

30.SummaryEnglish: As the day of the raid approaches, Kin’emon discusses the plan, and at Onigashima, Kaido and Big Mom make a stunning declaration! In the meantime, Zoro is stunned by Enma’s demonic power and its ties to him. Manga Chapter(s): 954-955 Anime Episode(s): 955-956

31.SummaryEnglish: The resolution that passed during the Reverie and the incidents surrounding the conference stun people all over the world and corner the Seven Warlords of the Sea. Meanwhile, Captain Koby secretly contacts someone currently in Wano. Manga Chapter(s): 956 Anime Episode(s): 957

32.SummaryEnglish: Admiral Issho and Fleet Admiral Sakazuki argue over the abolition of the Seven Warlord system and the alliance between two emperors. Meanwhile, ex-Fleet Admiral Sengoku teaches the young Navy soldiers about the legendary Rocks Pirates. Manga Chapter(s): 957 Anime Episode(s): 958

33.SummaryEnglish: On the day of the Fire Festival, Orochi heads for Onigashima where a big banquet is being held, and the Red Scabbards meet at the Tokage Port rendezvous point. However, Kin'emon and his compatriots are stunned that none of their allies are there. Manga Chapter(s): 958-959 Anime Episode(s): 959-960

34.TitleEnglish: The Day of the Mountain God
34.SummaryEnglish: Forty-one years ago, Oden had not yet earned the respect of everyone, but when the angry mountain god almost killed Kin’emon, Oden stepped in. Still, disavowed by his father, Oden journeyed around the country, gathering followers as he went. Manga Chapter(s): 960-961 Anime Episode(s): 960-961

35.SummaryEnglish: Oden transforms Kuri and is made Daimyo over it. He also meets a kappa fishman and two minks, who soon become his followers. Kin’emon and the other vassals take Yasuie's strong words to heart and begin transforming themselves for their lord. Manga Chapter(s): 962-963 Anime Episode(s): 961-963

36.SummaryEnglish: Oden’s journey finally begins! He is in awe of all the things that he has never seen before, and for the first time in his life, he becomes a wanted person and makes the headlines, catching the eye of a high-profile figure. Manga Chapter(s): 964-965 Anime Episode(s): 963-964

37.SummaryEnglish: Back in Wano, the Shogun Sukiyaki falls critically ill and names Orochi proxy Shogun. Meanwhile, Whitebeard’s ship docks at an island, unaware that Roger and his crew are fighting against the Navy on the other side of the island. Manga Chapter(s): 965-966 Anime Episode(s): 964-967

38.SummaryEnglish: Oden visits Wano and sees his retainers for the first time in years, but he immediately returns to the sea and leaves his family behind in their care. After stopping at Zou for the final red poneglyph, the Roger Pirates finally make it to the last island. Manga Chapter(s): 967 Anime Episode(s): 967-968

39.SummaryEnglish: The Roger Pirates have completed their grand adventure, and the King of the Pirates is born! Gol D. Roger disbands his merry crew and Oden returns triumphant to his homeland of Wano. However, a sinister surprise awaits him upon his rightful throne. Manga Chapter(s): 968-969 Anime Episode(s): 969-971

1.SummaryEnglish: The Straw Hats rave over new bounties, and Crocodile and Mihawk pay Buggy a visit. Elsewhere, Dragon and his revolutionaries are shocked when they read about Sabo in the news, and an old comrade returns, a shell of his former self. Manga Chapter(s): 1058-1059 Anime Episode(s): 1086-1088

2.SummaryEnglish: The three-way struggle between the Marines, the Blackbeard Pirates, and the Kuja Pirates comes to an end when an unexpected figure shows up. On the Sunny, the Straw Hats talk about the recent incidents around the world and Luffy’s words surprise everyone. Manga Chapter(s): 1059-1060 Anime Episode(s): 1087-1088

3.SummaryEnglish: Sabo contacts his comrades, which prompts a certain eavesdropper to take action against an entire island nation! Meanwhile, Luffy, Chopper, and Jinbe alongside a mysterious girl become separated from the rest of the Straw Hats when a giant shark attacks. Manga Chapter(s): 1060-1061 Anime Episode(s): 1089-1090

4.TitleEnglish: Adventure in the Land of Science
4.SummaryEnglish: Franky and Luffy's groups are split up, but each encounter a person claiming to be Dr. Vegapunk. On the island, Luffy and co. find convenient food and futuristic clothing, but when a pacifista shows up, Bonney reveals her shocking relationship with Kuma. Manga Chapter(s): 1062-1063 Anime Episode(s): 1091-1093
